scn aaFreesideCoopClarenceEncounterScript
;this script has to be seperate from the quest due to how quickly it ;needs to reach the disablePlayerControls block
short timer short timerPassedFiveSeconds = 0
Begin Gamemode
if (getStage aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest == 30 && GetHasNote aaFreesideCoopFirstHoseaTape == 1) DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 setStage aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 40 setobjectivecompleted aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 30 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 40 1 endif
if (getStage aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest == 40 && timerPassedFiveSeconds != 1) PlaySound DRSMetalGarage01Open if (timer < 4) set timer to timer + getsecondspassed else showmessage aaFreesideCoopClarenceEntersSteelMill aaClarenceSteelMillRef.enable aaClarenceGuardSteelMill1Ref.enable aaClarenceGuardSteelMill2Ref.enable aaClarenceCookSteelMillDialogueTriggerRef.enable set timerPassedFiveSeconds to 1 PlaySound DRSMetalGarage01Close EnablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 endif endif End

scn aaRTBNcrQuestVariables
short hasQuestTriggerBeenEntered short refusedToWorkForNCR short agreedToHelp short toldRangerWilsonAboutVault23 short hoseaSurrendered short rangerWilsonHasMoved
Begin Gamemode if (aaRangerWilsonUndercoverRef.GetDead != 1 && (getStage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest >= 10) || aaHoseaFirstMeetingRef.GetDead == 1) aaRangerWilsonCampGolfRef.enable endif
if (getStage aaRTBNcrQuest == 110) if(aaVulture01Ref.GetDead == 1 && aaVulture02Ref.GetDead == 1 && aaVulture03Ref.GetDead == 1 && aaVulture04Ref.GetDead == 1 && aaVulture05Ref.GetDead == 1 && aaVulture06Ref.GetDead == 1 && aaDexterRef.GetDead == 1 && aaPaulaRef.GetDead == 1 && aaBethRef.GetDead == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 110 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 200 1 setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 200 endif endif
if (getStage aaRTBNcrQuest == 190) if(aaHoseaFirewaterCaveRef.GetDead == 1 && aaVulture01Ref.GetDead == 1 && aaVulture02Ref.GetDead == 1 && aaVulture03Ref.GetDead == 1 && aaVulture04Ref.GetDead == 1 && aaVulture05Ref.GetDead == 1 && aaVulture06Ref.GetDead == 1 && aaDexterRef.GetDead == 1 && aaPaulaRef.GetDead == 1 && aaBethRef.GetDead == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 190 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 200 1 setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 200 endif endif
if ((getStage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest >= 50 && getStage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest <= 130) || (getQuestCompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest == 1 && getStage aaRTBNcrQuest < 240)) if (aaHoseaFirewaterCaveRef.GetDead == 1) setstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 255 if(getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 10 == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 10 1 endif if(getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 230 == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 230 1 endif if(getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 235 == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 235 1 endif setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 12 1 endif
if(aaHoseaFirewaterCaveRef.GetDead == 1 && aaDexterRef.GetDead == 1 && aaPaulaRef.GetDead == 1 && aaBethRef.GetDead == 1) if(getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 12 == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 12 1 endif if (getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 190 == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 190 1 endif if(getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 120 != 1 && getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 200 != 1) setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 120 1 setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 120 endif endif endif
if (getStage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest == 140 || getStage aaRTBNcrQuest == 250 || (getStage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest == 255 && getStage aaRTBNcrQuest >= 240)) if(aaHoseaFirewaterCaveRef.GetDead == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 240 1 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 241 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 245 1 if (getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 250) setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 250 0 endif setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 245 setstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 255 endif endif End

Begin OnActivate if (aaVault23ElevatorRepairQuest.hasElevatorBeenRepaired != 1) if player.getav Repair >= 50 ShowMessage aaV23ElevatorBrokenMsg set ScreenNumber to 1 elseif player.getav Repair < 50 ShowMessage aaV23ElevatorBrokenNoSkillMsg set ScreenNumber to 0 endif elseif (aaVault23ElevatorRepairQuest.hasElevatorBeenRepaired == 1) ShowMessage aaV23ElevatorWorkingMsg set ScreenNumber to 2 endif End

scn aaVault23ControlPodScript ;See V112 for generic setup.
short mode ref myLink
Begin OnActivate player if (IsActionRef player == 1) if (aaFirewaterBunkerPowerTurnedOn.isPowerTurnedOn == 1) if (player.getItemCount aaVault23AccessPass >= 1) set myLink to getLinkedRef ;the linked ref should be the door. if ((myLink.getOpenState == 3) || (myLink.getOpenState == 1)) && mode != 2 ;door closed or open playgroup Forward 0 ;pull handle out set mode to 2 activate myLink ;activate all the things that this is an activate parent of - klaxon light and activator. setStage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 120 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 110 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 120 1 endif else showmessage aaVault23OpenMainDoorWithoutKeycardMsg endif else showmessage aaFirewaterBunkerPowerMessage endif endif end
Begin GameMode
if (mode == 2) if (isAnimPlaying == 0) set myLink to getLinkedRef ;the linked ref should be the door. playgroup Left 1 ;pull handle down set mode to 3 myLink.activate player endif endif
end

scn aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogueVariables
short gaveVault23PlansToHosea float timer short hasFadedIn short hasFadedOut short controlsReenabled short haveTriedToConvinceHoseaToSurrender
Begin Gamemode
if(gaveVault23PlansToHosea == 1) if(hasFadedOut != 1) ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackPermanent set hasFadedOut to 1 endif if(controlsReenabled != 1 || hasFadedIn != 1) set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed if (timer >= 5 && hasFadedIn != 1) RemoveImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackPermanent ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeInFromBlack2sISFX set hasFadedIn to 1 endif if (timer >= 11 && controlsReenabled != 1) aaHoseaFirewaterCaveRef.SetRestrained 0 EnablePlayerControls aaHoseaFirewaterCaveRef.StartConversation Player, aaHoseaReadVault23Plans set controlsReenabled to 1 endif endif endif
End

scn aaRangerWilsonFirewaterCaveForceDialogueScript
short eventHasBeenProperlyTriggered
Begin OnTrigger player if (eventHasBeenProperlyTriggered != 1) if(getStage aaRTBNcrQuest == 240) DisablePlayerControls ;four different force greets
;status quo if(getStage aaRTBNcrQuest == 240 && getStage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest == 140) ;status quo - vultures alive ncr alive, wilson force greets and tells player to make choice. Player told Vultures' location earlier if (aaRTBNcrQuest.toldRangerWilsonAboutVault23 == 1) aaRangerWilsonFirewaterCaveRef.AddScriptPackage aaRangerWilsonForceDialogueStatusQuoToldWhereHoseaWasEarlier set eventHasBeenProperlyTriggered to 1 else ;status quo - vultures alive ncr alive, wilson force greets and tells player to make choice. Player did not tell Vultures location earlier aaRangerWilsonFirewaterCaveRef.AddScriptPackage aaRangerWilsonForceDialogueStatusQuoDidNotTellWhereHoseaWasEarlier set eventHasBeenProperlyTriggered to 1 endif endif endif
; hosea dead if(getStage aaRTBNcrQuest == 245) DisablePlayerControls aaRangerWilsonFirewaterCaveRef.AddScriptPackage aaRangerWilsonForceDialogueHoseaDead set eventHasBeenProperlyTriggered to 1 endif
;hosea surrendered if(getStage aaRTBNcrQuest == 250) DisablePlayerControls if(aaRTBNcrQuest.hoseaSurrendered == 1) aaRangerWilsonFirewaterCaveRef.AddScriptPackage aaRangerWilsonForceDialogueHoseaSurrender set eventHasBeenProperlyTriggered to 1 endif endif endif End

scn aaRTBTheVulturesQuestKillNCRUpdateScript
; most of the quest updating logic is contained within dialogue and different triggers in the different places the player is asked to visit
short hasRangerWilsonBeenKilled short givenVulturesLights
Begin Gamemode
if (getstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest == 145) if (aaRangerWilsonFirewaterCaveRef.getDead == 1) setstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 150 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 145 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 150 1 set hasRangerWilsonBeenKilled to 1 endif endif
End

scn aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogueVariables
short wilsonHasSurrendered float timer short hasFadedIn short hasFadedOut short controlsReenabled
Begin Gamemode
if(wilsonHasSurrendered == 1) if(hasFadedOut != 1) ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackPermanent set hasFadedOut to 1 endif if(controlsReenabled != 1 || hasFadedIn != 1) set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed if (timer >= 5 && hasFadedIn != 1) aaRangerWilsonFirewaterCaveRef.disable aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier01Ref.disable aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier02Ref.disable aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier03Ref.disable aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier04Ref.disable RemoveImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackPermanent ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeInFromBlack2sISFX set hasFadedIn to 1 endif if (timer >= 11 && controlsReenabled != 1) EnablePlayerControls aaHoseaFirewaterCaveRef.StartConversation Player, aaHoseaReadVault23Plans set controlsReenabled to 1 endif endif endif
End

scn aaHoseaSurrenderScript
short hoseaSurrendered float timer short hasFadedIn short hasFadedOut short controlsReenabled
Begin Gamemode

Billy Jackson's Diary

Kid says he wants to leave town. Says this place is a deadend. Can't say I disagree with him, hoping he won't end up like me. Although, its a rough world out there. The Wasteland will chew him up and spit him out if he's not careful. Said he wanted to become a mercenary once he can afford a rifle. Good money in that but those boys are no joke. Told him to consider doing something else, like joining the Followers or something. Broke my heart when he told me to go fuck myself. I'm going to need to visit that motel near McCarran, try and talk some sense into him at some point. I don't know if I'm ready...
El Rey Motel Terminal Password
Sug4rB0mbz!
Managed to get admin privileges...

Well that was way easier than I expected. Pre war security really was a joke. Turns out they were accidently logging the password to the server. Managed to hop onto the box from here since they've gave this machine access past the firewall. This should be a good place to keep a quick journal of the job. Keeping a timestamp so Ella knows how hard this job gets. Might be able to barter a few extra caps out of it...
Journey south of Repconn...

Pretty good haul today. Had a look in those houses just south of Repconn HQ (I left that shithole as soon as I seen the pile of corpses by the entrance. No way Jose). The houses seemed abandoned. Might be account of the prison breakout I keep hearing about or the deathclaws that have moved into the quarry. Had plenty of pre war food stockpiled. Salisbury Steak, Sugar Bombs. Jackpot.
Need to be careful though. Pretty sure I'm being followed. Someone watching me from that old steel factory near the old rock crushing plant through binoculars. Seen him in Freeside too. Keeping my gun under the pillow tonight...
Hosea Holotape 1
Shortcut

Jackie,
Read this carefully you little shit. This is the final time I'm warning you. Don't lose the key to this door again. We just barely found it last time. Why on earth did you hide it behind "the stalagmite"? We're in a cave you fucking moron.
Holton
Rubber Dinosaur Programming

In software engineering, rubber dinosaur debugging is a method of debugging code. The name is a reference to a story in which a programmer would carry around a rubber dinosaur and debug their code by forcing themselves to explain it, line-by-line, to the prehistoric reptile. Many other terms exist for this technique, often involving different (usually) inanimate objects, or pets such as a dog or a cat.
No Place For Bootlickers

The NCR is not welcome in Vegas. Their system of governance is broken and all those who uphold it are part of the problem. That system is our enemy, not the small business owners, workers and not even the soldiers who fight us. The problem is that these people are so devoted to the idea of the old world that they'll die to defend it. Until they understand that the very thing they're upholding and the problems it causes, we, the Vultures, are happy to oblige them. Any bootlickers are welcome to join them.
To the people of Vegas. Here's our gift to you. The food grown on Vegas land, from our soil, we give back to their rightful owners. You no longer need to be intimidated by the Hawthornes and their thugs into working with them. We'll protect your land from those parasites if you aid us. Soon, it won't just be the scraps we scavenge or that which the NCR gives out of pity. We can defeat this two headed beast together.
The Vultures
Vault 23 - Electronic Key Cards Guidelines

This Vault Tec and Poseidon Energy joint facility uses state of the art physical security technology in order to ensure resident safety and efficient business practices.
In order to enter and exit the facility, enter their rooms and to operate certain equipment, employees must carry the keycard granted to them during registration.
There are five levels of access:
1. Visitor 2. Junior Staff 3. Intermediate Staff 4. Senior Staff 5. Executive Staff
Authentication is granted based on an electronic chip within the keycard. Each keycard communicates wirelessly with the central server when held within vicinity of the control panel of the appropriate doors and with the appropriate pieces of technology. Employees are expected to be wary of the presence of potential tailgating actors.
Visitor wristbands can be given to family members of residents before Vault closure. Please enquire at the administration wing for further details on registering their status as a Vault resident.
Vault 23 All Clear Notice

Following a nuclear event, Vault-Tec will monitor hazards such as radiation levels, enemy invasion, subsequent attacks, and other factors. Once conditions are deemed safe, this terminal will receive an all-clear notice.
Upon receiving the all-clear notice, Vault-Tec personnel may be evacuated at Mr Reeves' discretion. Disregard any notices from organizations or individuals not associated with Vault-Tec or Poseidon Energy, including government and military.
Build a better future with Vault-Tec!
To The Merc Who Has Been Hunting Me
For The Last Time, Leave Me Alone...

To/ Jesse
I regret to inform you that I'm not interested in joining your merry band of assholes. I've never heard of an endeavour so purely Unamerican in my entire life. Mr Reeves has been nothing but good to us by providing us with this opportunity. If memory serves me right, you'd be a pile of ash out there if it wasn't for him. Left to die with no Geiger counter to tell you how long you have left. Now, with all that said, I'm sure you understand my choice. Now would you kindly fuck off with your commie propaganda?
From/ Bill
I'd Like To Report A Crime

To/ Security Chief Holloway
Hi, I'd like to report a crime and one of your robots told me to put in a ticket via the Vault mailing system. Jesse Cooper is trying to organise us workers against Mr Reeves. I told him we wouldn't be anywhere without the boss and told him where to shove it. Cooper is in it for himself and I thought security would be interested to know what he's up to.
Thank you Bill Fitzpatrick
Thank You For Your Report

To/ Bill
NOTE: This is an automated reply.
Thank you for your report citizen. A moderator will analyze the ticket and get back to you in three to five working days.
Thank You Security Office Holloway
Join The Vault 23 Union

To/ Bill
I know we haven't always seen eye to eye but at the end of the day, you are one of us. Reeves is taking advantage of you as much as he is of us. I've worked for years in the agricultural wing and I'm telling you that these rations he's providing us with are a joke. Sure, we'll never have the same overabundance we did as when the Vault door first closed but something is fishy with the numbers. I know for certain we grow more than what's being given out to us. Its obvious he's using this ration system as leverage to make us work more hours. Have you noticed the people working non-contractual overtime are getting more ration tickets? This is not sustainable if we want to thrive down here.
The truth that he doesn't want us to know is that he needs us more than we need him. We can leverage a better deal if we all just organise. What's he gonna do when there's no food growing? Consider my offer at least, we need someone with your combat experience in our corner.
From/ Jesse
Appointment With Mr Reeves

To/ Dr Williams
Hi doctor, I'd like to arrange an appointment. I'm sure you have a big waiting list but I feel this is urgent. I'd like you to come to my office next thing early tomorrow morning. Try and avoid any of the workers seeing you. Wouldn't want them worry about my health.
Thanks Mr Reeves
I'd like the autospy report

To/ Dr Williams
Doctor, I'd like the report on the autopsy as soon as you have it. Do not let this get out. I would like to avoid a riot from Cooper's supporters. That would put all of us in danger which I'm sure you already realise.
Security Chief Holloway
Reply to I'd like the autospy report

To/ Security Chief Holloway
I'm sorry but ethically I cannot comply with your request. It violates everything I learned from my time as a student. The truth deserves to be heard no matter how inconvenient. Cooper's family deserve to know.
Dr Williams
Appointment With Mr Reeves

To/ Mr Reeves
Sure thing sir. Expect me at your quarters around 4AM.
Thanks Dr Williams
Welcome New Engineer

Jenni,
Hello, I thought I'd take time out my day to congratulate you on your promotion from Junior to a fully qualified engineer. I do this as a thank you for all your hard work last year. I'll send some engineers round to upgrade the lock as soon as their schedule permits. Keep up the hard work and I see more promotions in your future.
Mr Reeves
Doctor Office Closed

I regret to inform you that all medical services will be put on hold until we train up some new people. Doctor Williams exposed himself as a communist traitor and I do not feel that his values align with those of the company. It is because of this that we must part ways with the doctor. Thank you for your understanding and patience. Keep up the hard work everyone!
Mr Reeves
Come over please

To/ Ann
Please come over. My mom's at the diner for the night on a date. We've got the room to ourselves. She won't find out.
From Chris
Come over please

To/ Ann
Ah well, thought I'd at least try my luck. Maybe next time ;)
From Chris

To/ All
I'm inviting you, yes YOU, to invite the Vault 23 union. Mr Reeves is taking advantage of our labour and we deserve to be paid our worth. We do not deserve to be paid in minor rations while he and his partner eat what they want in their fancy suite. We will get everyone a fair deal but in order to do so we must stand TOGETHER!
From/ Jesse
Come over please

To/ Chris
Sorry I can't. I've got homework to do. I really need to pass this engineering test tomorrow. Its my last shot.
From Ann

[THIS IS AN AUTOMATED MESSAGE - PLEASE DO NOT REPLY DIRECTLY TO THIS EMAIL]
A Security Officer will be visiting you tomorrow for suspicious activity. Please do not resist. Any attempts will be met with force.
We've got to stick together

To/ Jesse
I'm with you Jesse, what happened to Kyle was the last straw for me. I'm done risking my life to keep this vault running only to get those shitty Dandy Boy Apples as a reward. Those ants can chew into the cables all they want as long as they're not chewing on my ass.
From Oliver
I'm in.

To/ Jesse
Count me in Jesse. My ma's leukemia is getting worse but the boss has told us she isn't a key worker. Fucking heartless bastard. If you can guarantee her treatment then I'm there.
From Cassandra

To/ Jesse
Sorry I can't risk it. I've got a family to worry about. I don't want anything to do with work politics. I just want to get paid to see my kids grow up.
From Lauren

To/ Jesse
Let me think about it. Its very risky for me as you well know. I know what Reeves' henchmen are capable of. My brother is never coming back. But I've got a wife to worry about.
From Terry

The most popular wattage for hydroponic bulbs is between 400-600 Watts. Most hydro gardeners use High-Intensity Discharge (HID) lights. HID bulbs produce light by sending an arc of electricity between two electrodes that are encased in glass with a mixture of gas and metal salts. The gas aids the creation of the arc, which then evaporates the metal salts, producing bright white light.
The Vault Tec 485W bulb is optimised for both growth and power consumption. It can be combined with a renewable source of electricity such as that of Lake Mead to create a sustainable method of agriculture underground. It is advised to leave the lights on for 12-15 hours per day for optimal results for growth.
ALERT: This wing has been locked down due to hostile action by dissidents. Please remain calm while the security team deals with the situation.
Year: 2076

I'm glad construction has finally finished. This contract will be enough to keep our bellies full without having to send my platoon to the front lines. I think Elsa will be happy that Mr Reeves has accepted our invitation to dinner. I'm more than happy to thank that man. I'm just happy that I haven't disappointed her. She was very skeptical when I made the decision to go private, which in all honesty, so was I. I could never have dreamed of getting offered this position. Guess two decades of command experience paid off in the end.
Year: 2079

Doctor Reed told me I should start writing down my thoughts. Said it might help. I'm sure he means well but I've never really been good at sharing my feelings, even if this is just for me to read personally. Honestly what's even the point any more. Everythings fucked. My men are fucked, skins falling off their face with how crazy the Muller Counters are clicking. Radio fucking silence.
No matter how many times I talk about it I still can't get over that two faced prick. We were supposed to be secure just like them. Must not offer value. He's always been the ideal American hasn't he?
Year: 2085
That's it settled. We're gonna unseal the bunker and start exploring whatever's out there. Radiation is getting in anyway. We're running out of food. What option do we have?
Year: ????
jgdffjnfn mjfeff fafbafn ffhegnfnvn nmskkl fgbff cxc zv rerq
Thank You For Your Purchase Of A Vault Tec Vault

Thank you for being our valued customer. We hope our Vault Tec Vault will meet your expectations. Let us know if you have any questions.
Vault Tec

I've got to say I'm shocked at just how productive we've been ever since we went underground. It makes we wish we made the move sooner. All we would've had to have done is pay for their healthcare, food, water and tuition in return for their services. Honestly the amount of growth we would've seen would have blown everyone's mind.
Either way, there's no point thinking about lost opportunities. We've got a bright future ahead of us in this Vault. Best part is that I don't ever need to eat any canned garbage like they recommended in those government presentations.
Expenses are down...

Expenses are down and productivity is up from the days before we arrived here. I don't need to pay wages anymore. Just the food that the workers grow to feed themselves. I also don't need to pay for lawyers to find the right loophole to stop those thieves in the government. This really is the good life. My own little Kingdom and with Anna as my queen.
Made a deal with the doctor...

Anna is really worried about my leg. Doesn't matter how many times I've told her it'll pass she won't listen. The swelling has came and gone the last few years and has never really been a problem. I've put an appointment on with the doctor just to prove to her I'm right. He'll be coming to my quarters early tomorrow morning. I can't let the workers think me incapable.

That rabble rouser Cooper has been at it again. First it was about the quality of the corn he was getting and then it was the amount the very next week. Now, he won't shut the hell up about the overtime him and his crew have had to work. Do they not understand that if the work is not done we will all starve? Holloway needs to have a chat with that young man.
Meds are running low...

We've had to start rationing meds. Treatment for radiation poisoning included. I've had to limit the use of RadAway to those who are essential to the running of Vault 23. This includes myself, my family and the heads of each department. The long term plan is to find a way to synthesize what we need using the technology we already have. I know this is possible if everyone is willing to put in the time!
If you've forgotten your pass Holloway...

Holloway if you've forgotten your pass again, you've already done it twice this month, go to the good doctor. He said he'll let you use his pass. Stop by his dorm and be kind to the man. He's under a lot of stress these days.
Mr Reeves
Food rationing requirements...

I would've thought running this place would have got easier over the years. Damn, was I wrong. Food rationing starts tomorrow and I'm not sure how everyone will handle it. It's going to follow the same priority system we used with the meds. I'm sure it'll piss off Jesse Cooper and his crew but fortunately for us not many people like that lot. We've got to ride this out until we're able to expand our crop growth facilities.
Holloway needs to deal with the situation...

This is getting out of hand. That fool Holloway wasn't supposed to make a martyr out of him. This is unsustainable, we'll all starve unless he gets this in order. Its fucking chaos down here. I need him to go and crack some skulls and get those bastards back in line or I'll have to find someone else!
Vault 23 - You don't need a password for this senior door.

Phil, for the last time you don't need a fucking password if you already have a senior card. That password you use for everything is now visible in the logs. If you're gonna name your password after one of the women in one of those porno mags then try not to type it into a monitored terminal. Now all the engineers know what you're into hahahahahaha! Jesus H. Christ. Think about how embarrassed your wife will be if she hears about this.
For the last time, the CORRECT password is a communal one. I'm glad we didn't let you choose it. Thank god. Next time you forget, just bring your senior card.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh hi. Its nice to meet you. I'm Dexter and you must be the new recruit. I'm the guy who fixes everything around here so let me know if ya need help.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome back. What can Dexter do for you?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for helping out with the republic. It's about time we caught a break honestly. Now, is there anything I can do for you?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I really hope Hosea has a handle on this situation. If you need stims or chems, I can sell you some. What'll it be?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDialogue_GREETING_00036D67_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah so you're the one Hosea was talking about. I'm Beth and I'm the doctor around here.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDialogue_GREETING_000224A5_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can patch you up or provide you some medical supplies but you'll have to pay for what you take.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDialogue_GREETING_000224A5_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Supplies are tight unfortunately, otherwise I'd fix you up for free. But for now, we gotta be stingy.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDialogue_GREETING_000224A5_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah you're back. I've not got much time to talk but I guess I can spare a little. What can I do for you?

ESP.ORIGINAL: The hero of Firewater Cave returns! I still owe you a drink. What can I do for you?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_00036A86_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah it's you! You survived! I really hope you managed to convince those residents to help us. We're gonna need it!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_0003593E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, good to see you again. Welcome to Firewater Cave. I hope Paula didn't give you too rude of a welcome.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_0002408E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry, she's just being protective. You'll be friends in no time. Anyway, how did you get on? Did you manage to get the caravan schedule?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_0002408E_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 60 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 50 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 60 1
Welcome back. I hope this cave is to your liking. If not, well I'm afraid there's not much I can do. You're gonna have to get used to roughing it.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_00024372_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish I had access to the same decorating services as the White Gloves Society but sadly it's not to be.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_00024372_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, what can I do for you?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_00024372_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah you're back. I hope you're making friends around here, if not, just give it a little time. What can I do for you?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_00024373_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're back. How's life treating you friend?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_0002A08A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you killed that squad then? Good. Wilson won't make our lives hell from now on. I wouldn feel any guilt if I were you.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_0003593F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was very much a kill or be killed scenario. The same will happen again if they try anything similar!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_0003593F_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm praying they don't send any more troops our way. Once we tie up a few loose ends, we might need to relocate just to be safe.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_0003593F_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You came through with the Vault and with the defence of Firewater Cave. For that you should be very proud.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_0003593F_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Going down there was dangerous. Before, you mentioned everyone was dead? What happened?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_0003593F_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetEnemy PlayerFaction aaTheVultures 1 1
You managed to get them to back off? Thank god! But I think we may need a new place to lie low.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_00035EFF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no way the NCR don't send an investigator to check for any evidence that we've been here. We'll make sure they don't find a thing!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_00035EFF_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll inform the others to start packing their things tomorrow. We'll still be here for the time being. It's gonna take some time I think.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_00035EFF_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although, if you come by and we're long gone then don't be shocked. We'll get in touch with you if that happens so don't worry.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_00035EFF_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either way, what you did there was impressive. Down right heroic! You got them to leave without a single drop of blood.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_00035EFF_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not many people could pull that one off. The world would be a far better place if they could.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_00035EFF_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I like giving compliments when they're deserved and what you did certainly fit the bill.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_00035EFF_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, you came through with the Vault. I remember you mentioning that everyone was dead. What the hell happened?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_GREETING_00035EFF_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got a few things to tidy up around here and then we'll head back to Camp Golf if you need to speak to me.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_GREETING_00034ABE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's take care of this raider scum first and then we'll talk.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_GREETING_0003508D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was tough but the bastard's down. Good job, you held your own there. Almost like one of the rangers.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_GREETING_0003508E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really came through for us and the NCR doesn't forget its allies. Take these caps, you deserve them.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_GREETING_0003508E_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't look like the rest of these wannabes. You must be the one Coleridge told me about.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I called you here because I wanted to thank you for helping get justice for my daughter.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_GREETING_0003760F_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're back. I've said all I have to say unless you've got some more questions.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah well, maybe another time after we retake Vegas huh? Anyway, what can I do for you?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh hi again. What can I do for you?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah? You look like you want something. Do I know you?

ESP.ORIGINAL: You said you were held at gunpoint. Tell me more.
Yeah. A couple of days ago, was business as usual when all of a sudden, a gang comes in and kicks the front door in; nearly taking it off its hinges.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy

ESP.ORIGINAL: They were screaming at the top of their lungs, demanding I give them all the caps in the register.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthrone_00000EAA_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It shook me up a little as it would anyone but my Pa taught me how to use a shotgun back on the ranch so I bided my time.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear the ringleader tell me to get out of town or I'd be leaving it in a bodybag. My Pa taught me to not to let anyone threaten me that way.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthrone_00000EAA_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So on their way out, I took a shot at one of them. Didn't hit the bastard clean enough, they managed to get away.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthrone_00000EAA_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought maybe The Kings would have come running to help with the gunshots so close by. But maybe they just don't care. Bastards.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthrone_00000EAA_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those thieves managed to get away with my entire day's profits. I can't do without that money I'm afraid.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthrone_00000EAA_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The job is to track them down and get my money back. There's a good share of the profits in it for you. Now, do you have any questions?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthrone_00000EAA_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get a job you bum.
Hey Conroy! We got a fucking snob over here. How about we teach them a lesson?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveGetAJob_00003FD1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: RewardKarma -10 startCombat player aaConroyRef.startCombat player
What can you tell me about this place?
This is the place to go where you've got nowhere else to be. Aerotech won't take us on account of Conroy's little problem.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveWhatCanY_000042B1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not gonna give up on him. That scumbag Fitz keeps him hopped up on Jet even though he knows it's killing him.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveWhatCanY_000042B1_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Problem is, Conroy can't go cold turkey or it'll kill him. So gotta take it slow and just hope he can wean himself off it.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveWhatCanY_000042B1_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We sleep out here on account of the people going in those rooms not coming back out. Lot of shady character's about this place.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveWhatCanY_000042B1_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything else I can help you with?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveWhatCanY_000042B1_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about yourself.
Who, me? Not much to tell stranger. Used to own a ranch back west until I came here trying to strike gold at Gommorah.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeAb_000042B4_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No matter how much I lost. Always that voice in the back of my mind saying it'll be black next time.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeAb_000042B4_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: House is no different from Fitz up there. Preying on the same impulses except he has the power to make the rules himself.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeAb_000042B4_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just shows that if you have enough caps, you can get people to think whatever the hell you want.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeAb_000042B4_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, thats just me rambling, what else can I help you with?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeAb_000042B4_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for a man named Frank Adams. Seen anybody called that?
You see a whole bunch of shady individuals in this area. I don't know anybody by that name but some people just stand out anywhere they go.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeAb_000042B6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well armored guy goes up and talks to Fitz on the balcony up there. No idea what they were chatting about but it looked like they had a deal.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeAb_000042B6_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fitz must have rented out one of the rooms up there to him. Seemed a pretty quiet guy, barely left the motel.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeAb_000042B6_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If ya ask me, he looked a bit out of his depth. Kind of had a nervous energy about him what little I did see.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeAb_000042B6_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ain't seen the guy for days, then out of nowhere we hear this loud bang. A gunshot coming from his room, sounded like a powerful round.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeAb_000042B6_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't make anything of it. A lot of people go in those rooms when life isn't for them anymore if ya catch my drift.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeAb_000042B6_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then a whole gang of shady motherfuckers I ain't seen before come rolling out that room, I wasn't gonna start asking questions.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeAb_000042B6_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dragged the man out the room. He looked dead to me but he could have been unconscious. Couldn't tell ya.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeAb_000042B6_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should get going.
Hope to see you again soon stranger.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveGoodbye_000042B8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: May the lord bless your journey. Hope to see you again soon.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveGoodbye_0003EF36_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard you might know something about what happened to a merc called Frank Adams.
Someone doesn't know when to keep their mouth shut it seems. Maybe I do. Maybe I don't. Problem is: I don't see what that has to do with you.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzTellMeAbo_00004879_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This again. I told you it ain't any of your business.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzTellMeAbo_0000487A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You look like someone who can hook me up with what I need. Think you can help out?
Depends. Are you NCR?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzDoYouSell_0000487C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: For a loyal customer like yourself, of course.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzDoYouSell_00004882_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
I've told you all I know stranger. Hope that helps.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzDoYouSell_00004883_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
Ah good man. I know of a place called Aerotech. You might wanna head there if you're struggling for caps. They can help you out.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzConvinceY_0000487F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue.convincedFitzNotNCR to 2 ShowMap AerotechOfficeParkMapMarker
No.
Good. Keep it on the down low. I can get you set up with Med X, Jet. Whatever gets you going.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzConvinceN_00004881_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue.convincedFitzNotNCR to 1 showbartermenu
What can you tell me about this area?
I pretty much run this joint. Anything going on around here better pass through my crew. Got that?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzTellMeAbo_00004885_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything else you want or can I have a smoke already?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzTellMeAbo_00004885_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should get going.
Watch yourself on the way down.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzGoodbye_00004887_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got a few armed guards here. Surprised the NCR hasn't said something to you.
Why would they do that? Me and the gang here aren't causing any problems. No matter what they say, they can't prove shit.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzWhyDoNCRT_00004B70_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they change their mind, we can always move our business across the bridge. Got any more dumb questions?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzWhyDoNCRT_00004B70_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. Did you see anything else?
Not too much I'm afraid. Kept my head down on account of not wanting to get shot.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeMo_00005144_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I did see the ringleader talk to Fitz up there but don't tell him I said that. Looks like the made a deal. That's about all I saw stranger.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeMo_00005144_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope that helps ya find him. Maybe this information's worth a few caps?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clive [010039F7] (mod) Quest : ([01003FC1]aaFreesideCoopCliveDialogue) 01003FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClive\aaFreeside_aaCliveTellMeMo_00005144_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivedisplayed aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 22 1
Has a merc called Frank Adams been this way?
I have no idea who that is I'm afraid. Only people that pass through here are deadbeats and myself. I'm already paying my muscle way too much.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzDenyKnowA_0000514B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't think I could afford another guard. Now if that's all you've gotta ask. Scram.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzDenyKnowA_0000514B_2.wav

The guard on your right still has her safety on. How about you tell me what I want to know?
[FAILED] Looks like we've got a troublemaker here! Guards!

[FAILED] Looks like we've got a troublemaker here! Guards!

Tell me before I vaporise you.
aaFitzSpeechCheck
[SUCCEEDED] Of course, you don't run an enterprise like mine without having some street sense.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzSpeechChe_0000570B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was just making sure you're not one of them. I wouldn't tell tell anyone about this. Not good for business if people knew I was going back on a deal.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzSpeechChe_0000570B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: RewardXp 70
Well armed men keep coming to the motel? What's the NCR gonna think? Time to get this out your hair.
[FAILED] You're not gonna do shit. How about you just run along before you get hurt?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzSpeechChe_00005716_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe I'll talk to the NCR about you?
Never mind. Let's talk about something else.
Whatever.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzCancelTal_0000570A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course. Not a word.
Glad we could reach an arrangement. The gang seemed to come from across the bridge. Sounds crazy as that's Fiend territory. I trust my guard though.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzPoliteGat_0000570D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: She knows what she saw. One thing I could tell ya is that they weren't Fiends.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzPoliteGat_0000570D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I looked through the binoculars to see them coming this way. They seemed to know the perfect route past all the Fiend patrols.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzPoliteGat_0000570D_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They eventually get here and their leader offers me a substantial amount of caps for access to the room your guy is staying in.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzPoliteGat_0000570D_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, I'm a pretty loyal businessman. Each of my customers is like family ya see. I offer them a service no-one else can provide them.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzPoliteGat_0000570D_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: As such, I would never sell out a paying customer but I'm also clever enough to know that a shootout is bad for business.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzPoliteGat_0000570D_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I tell my bodyguards to only shoot when its needed.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzPoliteGat_0000570D_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get to the point.
Glad we could reach an arrangement. The gang seemed to come from across the bridge. Sounds crazy as that's fiend territory. I trust my guard though.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzBadGather_0000570F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: She knows what she saw. One thing I could tell ya is that they weren't Fiends.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzBadGather_0000570F_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I looked through the binoculars to see them coming this way. They seemed to know the perfect route past all the Fiend patrols.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzBadGather_0000570F_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They eventually get here and their leader offers me a substantial amount of caps for access to the room your guy is staying in.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzBadGather_0000570F_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, I'm a pretty loyal businessman. Each of my customers is like family ya see. I offer them a service no-one else can provide them.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzBadGather_0000570F_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: As such, I would never sell out a paying customer but I'm also clever enough to know that a shootout is bad for business.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzBadGather_0000570F_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I tell my bodyguards to only shoot when its needed.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01004875]aaFreesideCoopFitzDialogue) 01004875 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzBadGather_0000570F_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What else can you tell me?
Well, after the gang leave. I talk to Conroy down there. You know, the old junkie by the car?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzQuestProg_00005718_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can give him a little discount if you know what I'm saying? Scratch my back and I'll scratch his.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzQuestProg_00005718_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have him tail the gang and watch where they're going. Seemed to go back across the bridge. They managed to leave just at the right time.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzQuestProg_00005718_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR guard was just changing shifts. So Conroy follows em. Says they were hiding out in some steel mill next to the old rock crushing plant.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzQuestProg_00005718_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, knowing Conroy he'd say anything for a fix. So you do what you think is best with that info.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzQuestProg_00005718_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I say let sleeping dogs lie but its your life. Now, with that out of the way. Can I go for a smoke already?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fitz [010039EE] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFitz\aaFreeside_aaFitzQuestProg_00005718_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someone's definitely been here while we've been gone. Guys, shoot anyone you don't know!
Someone's definitely been here while we've been gone. Guys, shoot anyone you don't know!

<Lie> Sorry, I'm just here to get the steel equipment.
aaClarenceCookLuckCheck1
I looked into some leads and it looks like Frank was kidnapped by some street gang.
A street gang? Sounds like a good lead. While you were away, I did some digging and heard about a couple of people who've been robbed recently.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthrone_00008E1F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Crimson Caravan's been hit a few times recently. I also heard Cassidy Caravans and a few other smaller players got burned to a crisp too.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthrone_00008E1F_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I also remember Pa saying before I left that some of our caravans had been attacked coming and going from our ranches.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthrone_00008E1F_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not sure which of the attacks are related, if any. Could be one big coincidence but I'm starting to have my doubts.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthrone_00008E1F_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wonder if there's a pattern. Definitely something to think about. Ah well, all that matters is that we catch the bastards. I want my caps back.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthrone_00008E1F_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you manage to overhear the name of the gang or anything that could help us? Any clue could help us catch them.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EA8]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest) Pantry Of Democracy EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthrone_00008E1F_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 50 setObjectiveCompleted aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 40 1 setObjectiveDisplayed aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 50 1 aaJackieMillsworthFortREF.enable
Found a holotape in one of the gang's outposts. Sounds like they're called "The Vultures".
Well that's way lamer than I expected. Normally, raider gangs call themselves something intimidating but I'm just left feeling kinda indifferent.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00008E21_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's duds in every avenue of life I guess. Anyway, I recommend you go speak to Jackie over at the Old Mormon Fort.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00008E21_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's one of those hippies. The way I heard it she's got some contacts in some of the gangs in Vegas. She's helped a few Fiends "rehabilitate".
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00008E21_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either way, we need that old bat. Chat her up and see if you can learn anything about these "Vultures".
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00008E21_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got any questions?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00008E21_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry. I can defend myself.
Yeah. You've got that wasteland hardass look about you. If I didn't already have Roy out front then there'd maybe be a job opening.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_000093DD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: People like me, you and Roy are what people should be looking up to out there. Too many people dependent on those hippies over at the old Fort.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_000093DD_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place could be a lot better if people were actually willing to put some effort in.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, it's definitely rough out there. Don't envy anyone living in Freeside.
No matter where you go in the wasteland, there's always some scumbags who can't take to an honest living.

Right? I've been saying that for ages. The customers just seem to ignore me though.

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain silent>
Yeah I hate hobos. Love killing them.
I tuned out the moment you started whining. Are you gonna tell me what you sell here or not?
Yeah, you're right. Hard work pays off.
Finally. Someone in this town who isn't afraid to work. Need more like you here in Freeside.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_000096C6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think its a little more complicated than that.
Can't say I agree with you stranger. You might not lead a fulfilling life but perhaps you want a fulfilling meal instead?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_000096C8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck you. I'm out of here.
<Remain silent>
I don't really know or care what you're talking about.
Well that's a bit rude isn't it? You in a rush? Nah, maybe you're just hungry. Perhaps I can get you some food?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_000096CF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, enough about that. What is it you sell here?
Let's see what you have for sale.
If its an omelette you're wanting, it'll only be five minutes.

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
I'm looking for some work. Got any?
Sure do. Got plenty of problems around here that I can't take care of on account of having to work behind the counter.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C90_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm needing someone who knows their way around a gun. I'd normally just use Roy but I need him around to make sure I'm not held at gunpoint again.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C90_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can tell you more if you're interested. So what do ya say?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Job's still open if you're interested?
