ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, I'm not interested.
Looks like I've misjudged you. You definitely looked like the mercenary type. Come back if you change your mind.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C92_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did he survive a shotgun blast from such a short range?
Guess he got lucky or my aim is just shit. Strange world we live in.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C95_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard on the radio that some courier survived getting shot in the head in Goodsprings. Maybe it's the same person?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C95_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did the culprit get past Roy?
He was out on lunch down at the Wrangler at the time. He's sweet on one of the escorts down there.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C97_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Poor guy. Hasn't got the courage to just go ask her out.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C97_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did the culprits look like?
There was a group of them. Ringleader seemed to be an older fella. The others seemed to look up to him.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C99_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There were two women and two other guys with them. Seemed like a cobbled together bunch. Maybe they were all a gang?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C99_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm out of questions. Where should I start?
I've got a decent idea of where you should start but there's one thing you should know first.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C9B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not the first merc I've sent on this job. Hired another armed merc, decent price too. Went by the name of Frank Adams. Local around here.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C9B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never pegged him to be a tough guy but I guess you've got to be to survive out there on a diet of radroach meat.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Always seemed like a fairly quiet kid but I guess people can surprise you. For example, who knew I'd be in business in my late twenties?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C9B_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: When Frank heard about the robbery, he offered to investigate as long as I could pay him well.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C9B_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Naive young kid undercut himself I think. Either way, I'm not one for complaining when I get a good deal.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C9B_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm starting to think it might have been him that robbed me and he's came back for a double dip. Kid was always dirt poor.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C9B_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either way, I think he's our best lead. You might want to start by talking to his drunken ass of a friend, Billy.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C9B_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He can be found in the Atomic Wrangler, most likely crawling on the floor drunk.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C9B_9.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch yourself there, I swear the card dealers cheat in that dump. Anyway, you need anything else before you go?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009C9B_10.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the Kings?
They're the biggest gang in town. People around here seem to think they're good for the community.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009F7A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, do they forget that they need to pay that pretty boy by the water pump everytime they want a drink?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009F7A_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anywhere else, they call that extortion. Anyway, enough about those jokers. What else can I do for you?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009F7A_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the Silver Rush down the alleyway opposite this shop?
It's owned by the Van Graffs. They're a powerful family from New Reno. Not to be messed with.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009F7C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They sell powerful energy weapons so if you're looking for something exotic then the Silver Rush is your best bet.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009F7C_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just make sure to keep your mouth shut, especially near Jean Baptiste. Don't think I've heard anything good about that man.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009F7C_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the Atomic Wrangler?
It's a cheap knock off of the Vegas casinos. Most people who don't meet the cap requirements those bots ask for end up there.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009F7E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Put it this way, I'd love access to the Garret Twins' safe. Think that'd make me a very rich woman.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00009F7E_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to know more about Freeside.
Sure thing. I can tell ya what I know. What exactly do you wanna know about?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_0000A25D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about something else.
Okay. What do you wanna talk about?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_0000A25F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What else can you tell me about Jackie?
As I said, she's one of the Followers. Those kinda types pretend they're holier than thou but they're human like the rest of us.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00010A2E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But there's that old saying that never seems to disappear: "I'll scratch your back and you scratch mine".
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00010A2E_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do her a favour and I'm sure she'll tell you want we wanna know. Could also try sweet talking her or maybe she keeps a diary, I dunno.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00010A2E_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either way, I'm sure you'll figure it out. Just try not to start any fights, I don't want that associated with my brand.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00010A2E_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other questions?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00010A2E_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything you can tell me about The Vultures?
The only thing I can tell you is they must be small time. I've heard of most gangs in Vegas. You've got The Kings, The Scorpions.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00010A30_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've also got those bastard Fiends. Drugged out whackos. Never heard of The Vultures though. Gotta say that's a new one to me.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00010A30_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other questions?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00010A30_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I haven't got any more questions.
Good. Go and see what that old bat knows then.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00010A32_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you do here?
As I told you before, I'm a simple therapist. I typically help people who badly need someone to talk to.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00010D18_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I normally help people overcome addiction which is unfortunately a massive task in Freeside.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00010D18_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you've not already, talk to Julie. She's got a few ideas on helping out the community.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00010D18_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What else can I help you with?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should get going.
Just let me know if you ever need to chat.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00010D1A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you calling weathered?
Don't worry stranger. I didn't mean anything bad by it. You just look like someone who can look after themselves.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00010D1D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's sort of become my specialty. Rehabilitating raiders that is. Well, if you're not an ex-raider then how can I help you?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00010D1D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do I really look like a raider?
Don't worry stranger. I didn't mean anything bad by it. You just look like someone who can look after themselves.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00010D1F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's sort of become my specialty. Rehabilitating raiders that is. Well, if you're not an ex-raider then how can I help you?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00010D1F_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not a raider. Just looking to talk.
My apologies then. I didn't mean anything by it. You just look like someone who can look after themselves.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00010D21_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's sort of become my specialty. Rehabilitating raiders that is. Well, if you're not an ex-raider then how can I help you?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00010D21_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard you know about the local gangs. What can you tell me about The Vultures?
Whoever you heard that from was right. Yeah I know about them. I could tell you but it depends, what do you want with them?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00011000_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest.hasAskedJackieMillsworthAboutHosea to 1
The Freeside Coop was robbed. I think The Vultures might be responsible.
Robbing local businesses sounds very out of character for them. Normally they stick to NCR or raider targets.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00011002_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, their leader is a man named Hosea. He used to be one of us, the Followers I mean.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00011002_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was sick of the NCR pushing the common folk around, taking what they want. Sending all of Vegas' electricity and water back to California.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00011002_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I sympathise with him. But there are better ways to fight that don't involve violence.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00011002_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately, that's not the prevailing opinion out there in the wastes.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00011002_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Coop was just robbed up the street. Getting paid to find the pricks who did it.
Robbing local businesses sounds very out of character for them. Normally they stick to NCR or raider targets.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_000115BE_1.wav

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_000115BE_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess I don't have much choice but to do you that favour.
I'm glad we could come to an agreement. Trust me, helping the unfortunate in Vegas is something we could all stand to do a little more of.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: What I need is a bit of a long story so I'll try to be as brief as possible. A few weeks back a little girl came through that gate there.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: She couldn't have been older than six years old. Her parents were nowhere to be found which is sadly a more common occurence than you think.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Its getting rougher out there I swear.

I've got no more questions.
Okay, good. Come back with the watch and I'll set up the meeting.

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivedisplayed aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneQuest 55 1
What can you tell me about The Scorpions?
They operate out of the Monte Carlo suites just outside of Westside. They might not be as strong as The Fiends but they're not to be messed with.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00012CBF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Westside Militia usually keep them from striking the town directly. They usually prey on any townie or outsider who strays too far from town.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00012CBF_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be careful around there and always keep your weapon handy. Any other questions?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Millsworth [01010D11] (mod) Quest : ([01010D15]aaFreesideCoopJackieMillsworthDialogue) 01010D15 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueJackieMillsworth\aaFreeside_aaJackieMillswo_00012CBF_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRanger
So you've seen Hosea's work first hand then? I saw the whole thing. Poor girl didn't stand a chance as soon as the shooting started.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonS_0001583D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bastards've got a grudge against NCR. Ella was one of us and we'll make them pay for what they've done.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonS_0001583D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard you're something of a mercenary around these parts. So I'm here to let you know that the Bear rewards its friends handsomely.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonS_0001583D_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Especially those that help in the fight against terrorist scum. Now, my sources tell me that you've secured a meeting with Hosea. Is that correct?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonS_0001583D_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage aaRTBNcrQuest 10 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 10 1
Yes, I'm supposed to meet him in North Vegas.
Great. Looks like we can use you after all. As much as I'd like to string that bastard up right now, the brass hasn't given me the go ahead.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonC_00015840_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've heard rumours from the locals that The Vultures might have discovered something big. Command thinks it could be something dangerous.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonC_00015840_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They don't want to leave our outposts open to retaliation without a full reconnaissance of their capabilities.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonC_00015840_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what I want you to do is go to this meeting with Hosea and try and get in his good books. Figure out what he's got planned.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonC_00015840_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do that and you'll be rewarded for your efforts. So what do you say?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonC_00015840_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm confused. I have some questions.
I'm sure you have many. I'll answer what I can. Shoot.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonA_00015E0E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did The Vultures kill Ella?
Her father Jack Hawthorne is a very powerful man in the republic. Made his name building a Brahmin empire.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonW_00015E10_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's helped create a lot of jobs for the folks east of Klamath over the years. He won't be best pleased when he hears of the news.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonW_00015E10_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for why they killed her, could be to get to Old Man Jack. Who knows? Trying to get in the mind of Hosea is a hard task I'm afraid.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonW_00015E10_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do the NCR care about a small store owner in Freeside?
Do you know why its called the Freeside Co-op? No? Well, the girl's father is the charitable type.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonW_00015E12_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is just what happens when you try to help these animals. I swear the troops should just come and occupy this shithole.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonW_00015E12_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either way, Ella was one of our own. Hosea will learn the hard way that when you mess with one of us then you'll have to deal with all of us.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonW_00015E12_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
Let's just say I have some friends in the republic. All will become clear in time. Anything else you want to ask?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonW_00015E14_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no more questions.
Good, glad I could help. Now back to talking about that meeting you've got with Hosea. Would I be right in my assumption?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonN_00015E16_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of reward are we talking here?
How about knowing you helped the NCR stop a dangerous terrorist? If that doesn't interest you then how does 1000 caps sound?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonA_00015E18_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I have no interest in working with the NCR.
Its a free country. Although, if I see you've thrown your lot in with Hosea then it won't just be him staring at the barrel of a rifle on the wall.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonN_00015E1A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage aaRTBNcrQuest 255 set aaRTBNcrQuest.refusedToWorkForNCR to 1 aaRangerWilsonUndercoverRef.AddScriptPackage aaRangerWilsonGoHomeTravelPackage aaRangerWilsonUndercoverRef.evp EnablePlayerControls
I will think about it.
Sounds good to me. I'll go meet Hosea then.
Good. If you can find out where their stronghold is located and what they're planning then we've got that asshole dead to rights.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonA_000160FB_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come meet me and my squad at Camp Golf once he trusts you. Will have more work for you there if you're looking for more opportunities to get paid.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonA_000160FB_2.wav

I'll think about it.
Better than nothing. If you can find out where their stronghold is located and what they're planning then we've got that asshole dead to rights.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonT_000160FD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come meet me and my squad at Camp Golf once he trusts you. Will have more work for you there if you're looking for more opportunities to get paid.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonT_000160FD_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me warn you though, if I see you've thrown your lot in with Hosea then it won't just be him staring at the barrel of a rifle on the wall.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonT_000160FD_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got that? Good. Now off you go.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101527A] (mod) Quest : ([0101583E]aaRTBRangerWilsonDialogue) 0101583E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBRange_aaRangerWilsonT_000160FD_4.wav

I'm a friend of Jackie's. I'm here to see Hosea.
So you're the one the boss told me about. You don't look like much. Not for me to say though. Go right on through.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vulture Soldier [01016FBD] (mod) Quest : ([01017863]aaRTBHoseaGuardDialogue) 01017863 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueVultureHoseaHotelGuard\aaRTBHosea_aaHoseaHotelRoo_00017867_1.wav

So you're the one the boss told me about. Go right on through. He's waiting for you.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vulture Soldier [01016FBD] (mod) Quest : ([01017863]aaRTBHoseaGuardDialogue) 01017863 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueVultureHoseaHotelGuard\aaRTBHosea_aaHoseaHotelRoo_00017868_1.wav

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vulture Soldier [01016FBD] (mod) Quest : ([01017863]aaRTBHoseaGuardDialogue) 01017863 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueVultureHoseaHotelGuard\aaRTBHosea_aaHoseaHotelRoo_00017869_1.wav

I should get going.
Scram.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vulture Soldier [01016FBD] (mod) Quest : ([01017863]aaRTBHoseaGuardDialogue) 01017863 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueVultureHoseaHotelGuard\aaRTBHosea_aaHoseaHotelRoo_0001786E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah so you came after all. Nice to meet you. Come. Take a seat up here at the table when you're ready.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaFirstEnc_00017878_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaHoseaPlayerSatOnCouchForceDialogue
Ah, so we finally meet. Jackie told me about you. I bet you were expecting someone a lot more intimidating when you first heard the stories.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPlayerSa_00017B64_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry for not living up to living up to your imagination. The title: 'Raider Boss' doesn't really conjure images of a seventy year old man does it?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPlayerSa_00017B64_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No matter. Its good to finally put a face to the name I've been hearing so much about. I have no idea why but I have a good feeling about you.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPlayerSa_00017B64_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Probably just nostalgia. Used to be a young nomad myself; always on the lookout for raiders. God, that was probably before you were even born.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPlayerSa_00017B64_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, enough about me. What made you decide to come here after all?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaPlayerSa_00017B64_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The holotape you left me mentioned a job.
It did. The Hawthorne girl hired you before and now I'd like to do the same. 'Hire' might be the wrong word. 'Recruit' seems more fitting.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAskAbout_00017B68_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry. You'll be paid accordingly but I'm also offering you a dream of something more. A Vegas free of NCR rule.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAskAbout_00017B68_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're in desperate need of a new system. We're heading down the same path that the old world did and I, we, can't just stand by and watch it happen.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAskAbout_00017B68_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You look like you might want to know more.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAskAbout_00017B68_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaHoseaHolotapeOne
...another day, another raid. Its getting tougher these days to stay under the radar with the NCR relying more on bounty hunters to see them through.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017E48]aaHoseaHolotapeLines) 01017E48 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaHol_aaHoseaHolotape_00017E4A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Its only gonna get more difficult with the Fiends taking hits. They're scum but undoubtedly a good distraction.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017E48]aaHoseaHolotapeLines) 01017E48 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaHol_aaHoseaHolotape_00017E4A_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have faith. The Vultures will hold no matter what comes our way. The people of Vegas are strong regardless of what House and the Republic think.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017E48]aaHoseaHolotapeLines) 01017E48 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaHol_aaHoseaHolotape_00017E4A_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We actually caught a merc tailing us the other day. Was snooping around just outside the mill thinking we didn't catch wind of him.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017E48]aaHoseaHolotapeLines) 01017E48 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaHol_aaHoseaHolotape_00017E4A_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ambushed him when he went back to his room at the El Rey. We lost Tracy, going to have to tell her parents which is never an easy job. Poor girl.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017E48]aaHoseaHolotapeLines) 01017E48 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaHol_aaHoseaHolotape_00017E4A_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thankfully, we still managed to incapacitate him. Kid thinks we're going to throw him into the furnace. Might do if he insists on following us.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017E48]aaHoseaHolotapeLines) 01017E48 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaHol_aaHoseaHolotape_00017E4A_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're lucky the boy was still green. All things considered, that could have went far worse. Still... Tracy...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017E48]aaHoseaHolotapeLines) 01017E48 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaHol_aaHoseaHolotape_00017E4A_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boy says that the Hawthorne girl hired him to track us down. Just like those bastards to go for cheap labour.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017E48]aaHoseaHolotapeLines) 01017E48 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaHol_aaHoseaHolotape_00017E4A_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Girl's tougher than she looks. Thought she would have skipped town after the robbery. Some things have gotta be done the hard way it seems.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017E48]aaHoseaHolotapeLines) 01017E48 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaHol_aaHoseaHolotape_00017E4A_9.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I offered the young kid, Frank's his name, a choice. He's a Vegas kid through and through but you never know. Let's hope he makes the right decision.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017E48]aaHoseaHolotapeLines) 01017E48 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaHol_aaHoseaHolotape_00017E4A_10.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is this place?
It's a store my father and I set up. We provide an outlet for the goods of local Vegas farmers.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00017E4C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a win/win situation. We get paid and the farmers get access to a much larger customer base both in Vegas and back home in the NCR.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00017E4C_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The farmers wouldn't be able to get their produce anywhere near as far without us.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00017E4C_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try explaining that to them though. They'll just end up grumbling about how we're eating into their profits. The profits we helped them get.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00017E4C_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So if you know anyone reasonable who's looking to sell produce, tell them all about the co-op.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00017E4C_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're wondering what exactly you can buy, it's fresh produce straight from the farm. We also sell all manner of pre-war food.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00017E4C_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, with all that said. Is there anything I can get you?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00017E4C_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I came because I was curious about The Vultures.
I formed the Vultures so the people of the Mojave could escape their destiny as a territory of the NCR, or worse, Caesar's Legion.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaCameBeca_0001840A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, to business. The Hawthorne girl hired you before and I'd like to replace her as your employer.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaCameBeca_0001840A_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry. You'll be paid accordingly but I'm also offering you a dream of something more. A Vegas free of NCR rule.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaCameBeca_0001840A_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're in desperate need of a new system. We're heading down the same path that the old world did and I, we, can't just stand by and watch it happen.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaCameBeca_0001840A_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You look like you might want to know more.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaCameBeca_0001840A_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: To be honest, I was bored so I thought I'd see what this is all about.
Well, let's see if we can do something about that boredom. The Hawthorne girl hired you before and I'd like to hire you now.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaCameBeca_0001840C_1.wav

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaCameBeca_0001840C_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You look like you might want to know more.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaCameBeca_0001840C_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanted to know why you hate the NCR.
Well, let me explain why but first I have something that might interest you. The Hawthorne girl hired you before and now I'd like to do the same.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaCameBeca_00018410_1.wav

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaCameBeca_00018410_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> I came to kill you.
Such a waste. Mike, get in here! We've got an NCR whore here!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaCameToKi_0001840F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: startCombat player aaVultureHoseaRoomGuardRef.startCombat player
Yes I would. What do you have against the NCR?
The brahmin barons of the NCR are rot that's been allowed to fester. Corruption runs rampant in the halls of congress because of those bastards.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaTellMeMo_000186EF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It wasn't always like this, the republic used to be a far better place. It finally offered a real semblance of safety in the wasteland.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaTellMeMo_000186EF_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Laws were once written to serve the people. Not so much anymore I afraid.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaTellMeMo_000186EF_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me give you an example: when President Tandi was in office, there was a limit on the amount of cattle and land a single person could own.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaTellMeMo_000186EF_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The bigger landowners couldn't just be content with their success. They needed to have more to satisfy their greed.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaTellMeMo_000186EF_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: In order for that to happen. Things would need to change. The barons turned to large scale lobbying to achieve their goals.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaTellMeMo_000186EF_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: As the years passed after Tandi's death, regulation was slowly peeled back until Kimball decided to repeal the land limit entirely.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaTellMeMo_000186EF_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This allowed the cattle market to monopolize and proved that the rich and powerful hold too much sway over the fate of the Republic.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaTellMeMo_000186EF_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't the people of the NCR vote for these policies that made the barons rich?
They did. But when the people aren't even offered a choice to the contrary, did they really?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaDidntThe_000186F1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look at the biggest contributors in the past three elections since Tandi's death and tell me the system still works.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaDidntThe_000186F1_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The same names keep popping up. Gunderson, Hawthorne, Weston. Although, yes you're correct; the people voted them in.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaDidntThe_000186F1_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what's the problem?
Politicians live and die by their funding. Just like everything else in this world, money is king.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaSoWhatsT_000186F3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: These people have massive influence on the policies each political party run on to the point where the working man does not have a representative.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaSoWhatsT_000186F3_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: And so it was, a lie sold to the people. A truly free market that would allow anyone with the determination to be a success in the republic.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaSoWhatsT_000186F3_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: And what a lie it was. The farmhands who voted Kimball in are working longer hours and getting paid less than what they were all those years ago.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaSoWhatsT_000186F3_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Small caravans businesses and ranch owners have been pushed out the market completely as the bigger outfits monopolize.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaSoWhatsT_000186F3_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that a system you think is worth saving?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaSoWhatsT_000186F3_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaHoseaHolotapeTwo
If this holotape has found you then you've found what remains of Ella Hawthorne. You might not understand why we've done this.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017E48]aaHoseaHolotapeLines) 01017E48 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaHol_aaHoseaHolotape_00018CAF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: She was the daughter of Jack Hawthorne, one of the largest brahmin barons in the NCR. I'm sure you know the name.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017E48]aaHoseaHolotapeLines) 01017E48 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaHol_aaHoseaHolotape_00018CAF_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This was the republic's attempt to slowly take over the farming industry in Vegas. Fair to say, that attempt now lies in ashes.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017E48]aaHoseaHolotapeLines) 01017E48 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaHol_aaHoseaHolotape_00018CAF_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you've been working with Hawthorne but now I'm giving you the chance to do what's right. Come meet me in The Gray, second floor.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017E48]aaHoseaHolotapeLines) 01017E48 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaHol_aaHoseaHolotape_00018CAF_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be waiting.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017E48]aaHoseaHolotapeLines) 01017E48 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaHol_aaHoseaHolotape_00018CAF_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should get going.
Finally. I've been waiting for a smoke break all day.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy [010146D6] (mod) Quest : ([01018CB0]aaFreesideCoopRoyDialogue) 01018CB0 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueRoy\aaFreeside_aaRoyStandardGo_00018CB6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mentioned there was a robbery?
Yeah, I'm afraid so. Was on break and that's when they struck. I'd ask Ella. She might have a job going to catch the bastards.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy [010146D6] (mod) Quest : ([01018CB0]aaFreesideCoopRoyDialogue) 01018CB0 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueRoy\aaFreeside_aaRoyAskAboutRo_00018CB8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about this place?
I'm not paid to know the details. You should ask Ella about it. Something about food and farmers or something.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy [010146D6] (mod) Quest : ([01018CB0]aaFreesideCoopRoyDialogue) 01018CB0 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueRoy\aaFreeside_aaRoyTellMeAbou_00018CBA_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you like working here?
Do I like working here? What the fuck do you think? How would you like to stand here most of your day with sore feet dealing with the locals?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy [010146D6] (mod) Quest : ([01018CB0]aaFreesideCoopRoyDialogue) 01018CB0 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueRoy\aaFreeside_aaRoyDoYouLikeW_00018CBC_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dumber than a bag of rocks, I swear. No matter how many times I say "talk to Ella", they come back and ask me anyway.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy [010146D6] (mod) Quest : ([01018CB0]aaFreesideCoopRoyDialogue) 01018CB0 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueRoy\aaFreeside_aaRoyDoYouLikeW_00018CBC_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't even get me started on those two fuckers across the road shouting the same tired slogans day in, day out until you have a migraine.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy [010146D6] (mod) Quest : ([01018CB0]aaFreesideCoopRoyDialogue) 01018CB0 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueRoy\aaFreeside_aaRoyDoYouLikeW_00018CBC_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So no. I fucking hate my job. Any more stupid questions?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy [010146D6] (mod) Quest : ([01018CB0]aaFreesideCoopRoyDialogue) 01018CB0 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueRoy\aaFreeside_aaRoyDoYouLikeW_00018CBC_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is better than the alternatives. California would still be a lawless wasteland without them.
You're right. Somewhat anyway. The rule of law has brought peace to the frontier. Applying it is where the republic runs into problems.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrIsBet_00018F9E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those laws are flexible depending on your social status. The powerful don suffer the same consequences as the rest of us.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrIsBet_00018F9E_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: One rule for the rich, another for the poor. Gunderson is a fine example of this.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrIsBet_00018F9E_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He infamous for intimidating competition within his industry. A complete brute of a man.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrIsBet_00018F9E_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he wants someone land, a few raiders happen to show up to attack their ranches. A few weeks later, hel conveniently move in.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrIsBet_00018F9E_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, its illegal. But grease the right palms and the problem goes away. Anyone else, without the connections, gets put on the chain gang.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrIsBet_00018F9E_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The system is rotten to the core. It needs to be torn down and rebuilt from the ground up.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrIsBet_00018F9E_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR may be beyond saving at this point. However, Vegas offers a fresh start. We can build something better.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrIsBet_00018F9E_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps, inspire the workers of the NCR to break their chains in the process. Join me and we can build a future for the people of Vegas!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNcrIsBet_00018F9E_9.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I couldn't care less about Vegas.
A mercenary at heart are we? Fair enough. Well, the pay is good either way which I'm sure will please you.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaCouldNot_0001927D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if you don't care. Doing a good deed is good for the soul. Either way, I'm sure you've already made your mind up.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaCouldNot_0001927D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what'll it be then? Will you help us?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaCouldNot_0001927D_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> I'm fed up listening to you. Time to die you old fart!
Mike?! We've got a bootlicker on our hands. Kill this bastard!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAttackWh_0001927F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: startCombat player aaVultureHoseaRoomGuardRef.startCombat player
You're right. Fuck the NCR.
Well, you're starting to sound like Vulture material. I need someone with your passion!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR may be beyond saving at this point. However, Vegas offers a fresh start. We can build something better.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaYoureRig_00019281_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps, inspire the workers of the NCR to break their chains in the process. Join me and we can build a future for the people of Vegas!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaYoureRig_00019281_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't like the NCR but violence is not the answer.
I wish you were right. I tried all my life to believe in that, I really have but I've found the message of peace to be completely impotent.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaDontAgre_00019283_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Years of working with the Followers to try and spread that message. Unfortunately, its time I will never get back.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaDontAgre_00019283_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The republic won change without any real threat to them from its people.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaDontAgre_00019283_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you've ever had the privilege to read some old world books then history is a place you mighte learned this.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaDontAgre_00019283_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: When the French sent their ruling class to the guillotines. The aristocracy of the other countries around Europe had to curtail their greed.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaDontAgre_00019283_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I not saying Hawthorne and Gunderson have to die. However, the people have to make their voices heard.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaDontAgre_00019283_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR may be beyond saving at this point. However, Vegas offers a fresh start. We can build something better.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaDontAgre_00019283_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps, inspire the workers of the NCR to break their chains in the process. Join me and we can build a future for the people of Vegas!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaDontAgre_00019283_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I couldn't care less about the NCR.
A mercenary at heart are we? Fair enough. Well, the pay is good either way which I'm sure will please you.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaCouldNot_00019285_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if you don't care. Doing a good deed is good for the soul. Either way, I'm sure you've already made your mind up.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaCouldNot_00019285_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what'll it be then? Will you help us?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaCouldNot_00019285_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you and The Vultures actually hope to accomplish?
I assume the doubt in your voice refers to the sheer size of the NCR? That certainly makes us have to scale back our ambitions.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatActu_00024935_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We cannot beat the Republic in a conventional war. Yet, anyway. My plan is to severely damage their supply line.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatActu_00024935_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is looking likely, despite their incompetence, that they will defeat the Legion when they come knocking at the Dam again.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatActu_00024935_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: With enough recruits and the correct people on my side, we might be able to delay them annexing the area by hitting their supply lines hard.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatActu_00024935_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: When the troops at the Dam start going hungry, the Republic will show its true colours. Then, the people of Vegas will defend their home.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatActu_00024935_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Revolution in its purest form.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatActu_00024935_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I assume the doubt in your voice refers to the sheer size of the NCR? That certainly makes us have to scale back our ambitions.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatActu_00019564_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We cannot beat the Republic in a conventional war. Yet, anyway. My plan is to severely damage their supply line.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatActu_00019564_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is looking likely, despite their incompetence, that they will defeat the Legion when they come knocking at the Dam again.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatActu_00019564_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: With enough recruits and the correct people on my side, we might be able to delay them annexing the area by hitting their supply lines hard.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatActu_00019564_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: When the troops at the Dam start going hungry, the Republic will show its true colours. Then, the people of Vegas will defend their home.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatActu_00019564_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Revolution in its purest form.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatActu_00019564_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're willing to start a war? What about the families of your soldiers?
Sadly war might be what is needed. If an opportunity arises to avoid it, I will glady take it. Its either that or live to work for the rich few.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaYoureWil_00024936_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: A badly beaten NCR will not have the stomach for a long drawn out war after their narrow victory over Caesar's Legion.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaYoureWil_00024936_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the end, Vegas will choose what is right. Now, is there anything else you wanted to talk about?
