ESP.ORIGINAL: I have some questions.
Very well. I'll do what I can to answer.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaIHaveQue_00024940_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure you do. Ask what you want just now. Also, feel free to ask at any point. My door is always open.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01019848]aaHoseaGeneralDialogue) 01019848 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no more questions.
Very well. Remember, you can ask me anything at any time.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaNoMoreQu_0002493F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. What else can I do for you?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01019848]aaHoseaGeneralDialogue) 01019848 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have some questions.
Very well. I'll do what I can to answer. And remember, my door is always open. Ask me anything at any time that suits you.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaIHaveQue_0001984E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no more questions.
Very well. Now back to what I was saying. Are you interested in joining then or have you not made your mind up?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaIHaveNoM_00019850_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll join.
Good. You're just the type of person I need. Although, The NCR has been trying to get a mole in here for a few weeks now.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([0101787D]aaRTBTheVulturesQuest) Race To The Bottom EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaRTBTheVu_aaHoseaIllJoinY_0001AA23_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I'm afraid I'm going to have to send you off on a little task to prove yourself. I want you to go meet a fellow new recruit.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([0101787D]aaRTBTheVulturesQuest) Race To The Bottom EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaRTBTheVu_aaHoseaIllJoinY_0001AA23_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and him have more in common than you know. Go meet him at the El Rey Motel, he'll be waiting.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([0101787D]aaRTBTheVulturesQuest) Race To The Bottom EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaRTBTheVu_aaHoseaIllJoinY_0001AA23_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use the passphrase: "Hit the beast while it slumbers". If its him, he should understand and fill you in on the details.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([0101787D]aaRTBTheVulturesQuest) Race To The Bottom EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaRTBTheVu_aaHoseaIllJoinY_0001AA23_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, its been good chatting but these old bones need some rest so I'll catch up with you once your task is complete. Good hunting.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([0101787D]aaRTBTheVulturesQuest) Race To The Bottom EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaRTBTheVu_aaHoseaIllJoinY_0001AA23_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 20 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 10 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 20 1 aaFrankAdamsMotelRef.enable
Sorry, not interested.
Well, that's a shame but I understand. This lifestyle is not for everyone. You're free to leave anytime with no repercussions.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([0101787D]aaRTBTheVulturesQuest) Race To The Bottom EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaRTBTheVu_aaHoseaNotInter_0001AA25_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you've made up your mind then, I better get going. Either way, it was nice talking to you.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([0101787D]aaRTBTheVulturesQuest) Race To The Bottom EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaRTBTheVu_aaHoseaNotInter_0001AA25_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shame I couldn't convince you to join us but that's just the way these things go sadly. Maybe we'll see each other around.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([0101787D]aaRTBTheVulturesQuest) Race To The Bottom EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaRTBTheVu_aaHoseaNotInter_0001AA25_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 255 if (GetPCEnemyOfFaction NCRFactionNV != 1 && aaRangerWilsonUndercoverRef.GetDead != 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 10 1 setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 15 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 15 1 endif aaHoseaFirstMeetingRef.AddScriptPackage aaHoseaGoHomeTravelPackage aaVultureHoseaRoomGuardRef.AddScriptPackage aaHoseaGuardGoHomeTravelPackage aaHoseaFirstMeetingRef.evp
I should get going.
Very well. A friend of the NCR is a friend of mine. Let's hope you keep it that way.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101BE3E]aaRangerWilsonGenericDialogue) 0101BE3E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonS_0001BE41_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back anytime.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101BE3E]aaRangerWilsonGenericDialogue) 0101BE3E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonS_0001BE42_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch yourself out there.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101BE3E]aaRangerWilsonGenericDialogue) 0101BE3E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonS_0001BE43_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about Camp Golf?
I'm not gonna lie, it's pretty comfy. Plenty of food, the matresses are soft. Can't ask for anything more really.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101BE3E]aaRangerWilsonGenericDialogue) 0101BE3E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonT_0001BE46_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Its another story for the troopers. Rough for those boys and girls down there. I don't blame them for hating it here.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101BE3E]aaRangerWilsonGenericDialogue) 0101BE3E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonT_0001BE46_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I absolutely loathed my drill sergeant when I first enlisted. Although, if I met her now, I'd buy her a drink.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101BE3E]aaRangerWilsonGenericDialogue) 0101BE3E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonT_0001BE46_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about Frank?
He's a good kid. He's like a little brother to me. His parents died young and I took him in.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonT_0001C125_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kid has it in his head that he has to leave Freeside, strike it big. Guess he doesn't want to be a deadbeat like me.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy Jackson [0100146C] (mod) Quest : ([01001A2C]aaFreesideCoopBillyJacksonDialogue) 01001A2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueBillyJackson\aaFreeside_aaBillyJacksonT_0001C125_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hosea is dead.
What?! I told you not to kill him. You were supposed to gain his trust. Now we'll never know what they're planning.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonR_0001D576_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not getting a single cap from me until you clean up this mess. Some scouts were able to find the location of a Vulture base.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonR_0001D576_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going to go kill every single one of those bastards to make this little problem go away. Understood?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonR_0001D576_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm done working for you.
So you go and make the problem worse and then want to bail? Get the fuck out my face but let me tell you: the NCR won't forget this!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonD_0001D578_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.AddReputation RepNVNcr 0 1 setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 255
You've got a deal.
I'm glad I made myself clear. I'm going to mark Firewater Cave on your map and I want you to go there and make sure no-one leaves there alive.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonA_0001D57A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We can't afford to let them escape. Last thing we want is for Hosea to be made into a martyr. You're going to fix that little problem for us.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonA_0001D57A_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back when the job is done or don't come back at all.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonA_0001D57A_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 110 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 18 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 110 1 aaFirewaterCaveDoorToOutsideRef.unlock
Hit the beast while it slumbers.
So you're the one I'm supposed to be waiting for? You're not what I expected. I was expecting a badass merc with an entire arsenal on their back.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0001FEBF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard you knew Ella quite well. Me too. I really wish things could have gone different for her.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0001FEBF_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: She seemed like a really sweet girl. She was always really nice to me. I didn't really see the bad in her that everyone was talking about.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0001FEBF_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hosea seemed to have his reasons though. He's a man with a vision. NCR are bleeding us dry and I'm ready to fight just like you are.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0001FEBF_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Has Hosea filled you in on what we'll be doing?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0001FEBF_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm the beast and I'm gonna slumber.
Is that the right... *shakes head* sorry I don't think I know you. Did you mean to say something else?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0001FEC1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here to help The Vultures.
What? I'm sorry sir, I don't know what you're talking about. Who are The Vultures? Sorry, I think someone else will need to help you.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0001FEC3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dawn is breaking, greet the new day.
Sorry, are you on a Jet trip? Maybe you need to sit down...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0001FEC5_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should get going.
See you later ma'am.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0001FEC7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: See you later mister.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_000207A0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No he hasn't. He said you would tell me the plan.
He must be testing my memory. Well he won't be disappointed thankfully as your man here has a good memory.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0001FEC9_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR transport crops using caravans from the local farms from here to the Mojave Outpost and then further onto NCR territory.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0001FEC9_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That corn could feed all of Vegas. So what he needs us to do is obtain the caravan schedule.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0001FEC9_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got no more questions.
Okay then. Glad I could help. Meet me back here once you've got the schedule unless there's anything else I can help you with?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_00020485_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 30 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 20 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 30 1 if(getStage aaRTBNcrQuest == 10) setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 25 1 endif aaRTBCaravanScheduleRef.enable aaPrivateVolkRef.enable
Seems like I'm the one doing all the work. Why can't I deliver the schedule?
Because I've already done my part for the cause and I'm only here because Hosea says I need to learn the value of teamwork.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_00020487_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd rather not tell you any more if you're alright with that.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_00020487_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are we going to use the caravan schedule for?
I couldn't tell you exactly but I reckon Hosea will have us take the cargo when the caravans are vulnerable.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_00020489_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think he'll use what we get to feed the hungry around Vegas. I could be wrong, I'm not really aware of what the strategy is exactly.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_00020489_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got any more questions?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_00020489_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got the caravan schedule.
You have? That's great! We're supposed to meet Hosea back at Firewater Cave once we're finished here.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_000207A2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll mark it on your map. I've got to attend to this delivery first sadly. Maybe I'll see you again later at camp. Good luck!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_000207A2_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 50 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 40 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 50 1 player.removeItem aaRTBCaravanSchedule 1 aaHoseaFirewaterCaveRef.enable aaFirewaterCaveDoorToOutsideRef.unlock
I should get going.
Got it. Watch yourself out there.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Volk [0102048A] (mod) Quest : ([010207BE]aaRTBPrivateVolkDialogue) 010207BE (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniquePrivateVolk\aaRTBPriva_aaPrivateVolkSt_000207C1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaPrivateVolkSpeechCheck
[SUCCEEDED] Well I'll be damned. That is good news. Here's hoping the shift rotations too. This post has been a real drag lately.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Volk [0102048A] (mod) Quest : ([010207BE]aaRTBPrivateVolkDialogue) 010207BE (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniquePrivateVolk\aaRTBPriva_aaPrivateVolkSp_000207C3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Holodisk is just to the right of me. Go ahead and take it.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Volk [0102048A] (mod) Quest : ([010207BE]aaRTBPrivateVolkDialogue) 010207BE (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniquePrivateVolk\aaRTBPriva_aaPrivateVolkSp_000207C3_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.rewardxp 45 set aaRTBPrivateVolkDialogue.privateVolkSpeechCheckPassed to 1 aaRTBCaravanScheduleRef.SetOwnership
Command sent me to retrieve the latest rota for the caravans. It's getting revised in a few weeks.
[FAILED] Sneaky little bastard. You almost had me. You gotta be high on something to think your smooth talking will work on me.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Volk [0102048A] (mod) Quest : ([010207BE]aaRTBPrivateVolkDialogue) 010207BE (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniquePrivateVolk\aaRTBPriva_aaPrivateVolkSp_000207C4_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your dirty hands off any of the equipment!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Volk [0102048A] (mod) Quest : ([010207BE]aaRTBPrivateVolkDialogue) 010207BE (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniquePrivateVolk\aaRTBPriva_aaPrivateVolkSp_000207C4_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The boss sent me for the schedule. It needs changed or something.
aaPrivateVolkBarterCheck
[SUCCEEDED] Someone's having an unlucky day. Left a whole bag of caps on the ground. Y'know what? I think it is time for a smoke break.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Volk [0102048A] (mod) Quest : ([010207BE]aaRTBPrivateVolkDialogue) 010207BE (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniquePrivateVolk\aaRTBPriva_aaPrivateVolkBa_000207C9_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You do what you gotta do.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Volk [0102048A] (mod) Quest : ([010207BE]aaRTBPrivateVolkDialogue) 010207BE (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniquePrivateVolk\aaRTBPriva_aaPrivateVolkBa_000207C9_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.rewardxp 40 set aaRTBPrivateVolkDialogue.privateVolkSpeechCheckPassed to 1 aaRTBCaravanScheduleRef.SetOwnership player.removeItem Caps001 25
How about you go on a smoke break? See that pouch of caps that fell out my pocket, they're yours.
[FAILED] Is that a bribe? Get out of my face before you get shot.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Volk [0102048A] (mod) Quest : ([010207BE]aaRTBPrivateVolkDialogue) 010207BE (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniquePrivateVolk\aaRTBPriva_aaPrivateVolkBa_000207CA_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll give you 25 caps if you look the other way.
aaPaula
Fuck! Its you! Vultures, to arms! The asshole who killed Hosea is here!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01020D88]aaPaulaTurnVulturesHostileDialogue) 01020D88 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaTur_aaPaulaTurnHost_0002106A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player SetEnemy PlayerFaction aaTheVultures 0 0
aaPau
Vultures! Wake up! The merc who killed Frank is here! Hosea wants him dead, kill the bastard!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01020D88]aaPaulaTurnVulturesHostileDialogue) 01020D88 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaTur_aaPaulaTurnHost_00020D8B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player SetEnemy PlayerFaction aaTheVultures 0 0
The Vultures won't take me in. I ruined my chance at initiation.
Damn. That was our chance to minimize bloodshed. Only one thing left that we can do really. We need to kill Hosea now while we have the chance.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonR_00021349_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know him. He'll go off the grid as soon as possible as soon as he thinks we're onto him.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonR_00021349_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to sort this out while we still can. Have we got a deal?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonR_00021349_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I can do that.
I'm glad we could come to an agreement. Its not quite what I hoped for when I planned this operation but I guess we have to adapt.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonA_0002134B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Luckily, we know where The Vultures are hiding out. Its called Firewater Cave and if you travel north of Vegas, you should find it.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonA_0002134B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back when the job is done and you'll be rewarded handsomely.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonA_0002134B_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 190 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 180 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 190 1 aaFirewaterCaveDoorToOutsideRef.unlock aaHoseaFirewaterCaveRef.enable
aaPaulaForceDialogueFriendly
Take one more step and I'll turn your head into paste. Hm, you don't look like NCR. Who the fuck are you?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about yourself.
Who me? Only person to really care who I was before becoming a Vulture is Hosea.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaTellMeAb_00021ED2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid there's not much to tell. I can't quite say I had a life changing moment or anything but if you insist...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaTellMeAb_00021ED2_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where do I begin? I guess I grew up in North Vegas and had to scrape by like every other kid who was unlucky enough to be born there.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaTellMeAb_00021ED2_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: In those sorts of places, you either join a gang or you starve to death alone with a needle in your arm. Strength in numbers is a powerful mantra.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaTellMeAb_00021ED2_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then my lucky day comes along, me and the gang go prospecting. Looking for scrap to go sell to the local merchants at the time.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaTellMeAb_00021ED2_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was no Crimson Caravan in the Mojave at the time. Otherwise I would have just become a caravan guard back then.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaTellMeAb_00021ED2_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Life would have been much simpler, let me tell you. Raiders still would have put a bullet in me but at least I would have been paid well.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaTellMeAb_00021ED2_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you heard that one right. I took a bullet and lived to tell the tale. Guess you could call me lucky.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaTellMeAb_00021ED2_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I must have passed out from the shock. Those snakes, the ones who said they were my friends? Yeah, they just fucking left me.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaTellMeAb_00021ED2_9.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Woke up in some travelling doctor's place with not a cap to pay the man. Take a guess who it was? Luckily, Hosea didn't much care for payment.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaTellMeAb_00021ED2_10.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was the first time I'd found someone who wasn't just looking out for themselves and that was when I knew Hosea was special.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaTellMeAb_00021ED2_11.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wasn't about to leave my debt unpaid and go back to a gang who didn't care for me in the first place.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaTellMeAb_00021ED2_12.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So that's when I decided to become Hosea's bodyguard.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaTellMeAb_00021ED2_13.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think about Hosea?
To be honest, don't tell anyone I said this. I don't really care much about NCR and taking the power back and all that shit.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaWhatDoYo_00021ED4_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm loyal to Hosea because I believe in him. He saved my life and I know he's a good person at heart.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaWhatDoYo_00021ED4_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will follow that man to hell and back. You got more questions or can I get back to my post?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaWhatDoYo_00021ED4_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about The Vultures.
Sorry, I don't really know that much. I know that sounds crazy but I'm here because of Hosea and Hosea only.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaTellMeAb_00021ED6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of the others can maybe help you. Beth or Dexter know a lot more than me. However, your best bet is Hosea, he has a way with words that man.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaTellMeAb_00021ED6_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should get going.
Got it. Remember, your welcome here anytime.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaStandard_00021ED8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about yourself.
I'm the handyman around here. Odds and ends that need fixed up I can help out. People normally tell me to fix their guns and armor.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dexter [0101F60F] (mod) Quest : ([01021ED9]aaDexterDialogue) 01021ED9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueDexter\aaDexterDi_aaDexterTellMeA_000221BF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I also know how to mix gunpowder and I know which bullet casings work best at punching through trooper armor.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dexter [0101F60F] (mod) Quest : ([01021ED9]aaDexterDialogue) 01021ED9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueDexter\aaDexterDi_aaDexterTellMeA_000221BF_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So if you need armor piercing rounds, just let me know and I can provide them if you've got the caps.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dexter [0101F60F] (mod) Quest : ([01021ED9]aaDexterDialogue) 01021ED9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueDexter\aaDexterDi_aaDexterTellMeA_000221BF_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's see what you have for sale.
Ideally, I'd give you all this for free but we have to manage what we have carefully.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dexter [0101F60F] (mod) Quest : ([01021ED9]aaDexterDialogue) 01021ED9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueDexter\aaDexterDi_aaDexterLetsSee_000221BD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're better off than most here, so I'm gonna have to ask you to pay.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dexter [0101F60F] (mod) Quest : ([01021ED9]aaDexterDialogue) 01021ED9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueDexter\aaDexterDi_aaDexterLetsSee_000221BD_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: ShowBarterMenu
What can you tell me about The Vultures?
I mean where do I start with a question like that? The NCR call us terrorists but what do you call what they did to the Khans at Bitter Springs?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dexter [0101F60F] (mod) Quest : ([01021ED9]aaDexterDialogue) 01021ED9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueDexter\aaDexterDi_aaDexterTellMeA_000221BE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think of Hosea?
He's a good leader. I might not always agree with some of the methods we use but what alternative do we have in Vegas?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dexter [0101F60F] (mod) Quest : ([01021ED9]aaDexterDialogue) 01021ED9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueDexter\aaDexterDi_aaDexterWhatDoY_000221C0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: House? He only cares about what's going on inside the Strip's gates. He doesn't care about everyone in Vegas.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dexter [0101F60F] (mod) Quest : ([01021ED9]aaDexterDialogue) 01021ED9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueDexter\aaDexterDi_aaDexterWhatDoY_000221C0_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion? They're worse than the NCR in every way. I'd rather send all my caps straight to Kimball's cabinet, lining their pockets even more.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dexter [0101F60F] (mod) Quest : ([01021ED9]aaDexterDialogue) 01021ED9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueDexter\aaDexterDi_aaDexterWhatDoY_000221C0_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. An independent Vegas is the only way for the people to truly win and that's what Hosea is offering. So sign me up.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dexter [0101F60F] (mod) Quest : ([01021ED9]aaDexterDialogue) 01021ED9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueDexter\aaDexterDi_aaDexterWhatDoY_000221C0_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should go.
No problem. Hope to see you again soon if you ever need weapons or ammo. Also, if you ever wanna just chat, I'm here.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dexter [0101F60F] (mod) Quest : ([01021ED9]aaDexterDialogue) 01021ED9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueDexter\aaDexterDi_aaDexterStandar_000221BC_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you repair my equipment?
Sure. Come into Dexter's laboratory.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dexter [0101F60F] (mod) Quest : ([01021ED9]aaDexterDialogue) 01021ED9 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueDexter\aaDexterDi_aaDexterRepairM_000221C2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: ShowRepairMenu
What can you tell me about The Vultures?
You joined up without knowing what we're all about? For me, we're trying to create a fair New Vegas. A true meritocracy. People get what they put in.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethTellMeAbo_0002278D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make no mistake though, even those who don't or are incapable of work should be treated like human beings and not forced to starve like in the NCR.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethTellMeAbo_0002278D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've met a few retired NCR veterans in my time, back when I was travelling. Some of which lost their legs to Brotherhood landmines.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethTellMeAbo_0002278D_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those people are given a medal and left to fend for themselves. If they don't have any family to take care of them then they are left to rot.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethTellMeAbo_0002278D_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We can be different from the NCR though, everyone in Vegas should be treated with dignity and respect.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethTellMeAbo_0002278D_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Odd that the tribal societies in the Utah area are often called uncivilised when they'll actually look after their own.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethTellMeAbo_0002278D_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ask someone else why they joined The Vultures and you might get a different answer. For me, its the hope that Vegas can offer something different.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethTellMeAbo_0002278D_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man, it feels weird talking politics without being six bottles deep but I guess its always good to remind yourself of why you're here.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethTellMeAbo_0002278D_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry I talked your ear off. Maybe there's something else I can do for you?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethTellMeAbo_0002278D_9.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think about Hosea?
He's an inspiration. The amount of people needing patched up in Outer Vegas will remain the same so long as our current lifestyle remains the same.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethWhatDoYou_0002278B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once we change those conditions, people might not need to kill each other just to eat.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethWhatDoYou_0002278B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: For recognising that, Hosea will always have my respect.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethWhatDoYou_0002278B_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about yourself.
Ah okay, we may as well start getting to know each other as we're in this for the long haul.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethTellMeAbo_0002278C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Funnily enough, I was a travelling doctor just like Hosea was at one time. I didn't have the privilege of being in the Followers though.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethTellMeAbo_0002278C_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I did have a good teacher in Westside back in the day even if some of their practices were questionable.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethTellMeAbo_0002278C_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those days were some of the busiest in my life. The line of patients just never ended and you had to work with limited stims and meds.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethTellMeAbo_0002278C_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know how heartbreaking it is to tell someone their child won't make it? Years and years of that really takes its toll.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethTellMeAbo_0002278C_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the reason why when meeting Hosea, joining up was the easiest decision of my life. Maybe one day, things can be different.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethTellMeAbo_0002278C_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry that got quite dark but its the truth. I wouldn't blame you if you want to talk about something else. What else can I do for you?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethTellMeAbo_0002278C_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need medical supplies.
You know the drill. You'll need to pay for what you need.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethINeedMedi_0002278E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: ShowBarterMenu
I'm hurt. I need help, Doc.
I can help you out. Hopefully the procedure is as painless as possible.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethMedical_0002279B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm, are you sure. You look fine to me. I don't want to waste supplies on a few scratches. Come back when its something serious.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethMedical_0002279C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should go.
Very well. I hope I don't see you again soon... because it means you aren't hurt ya know?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethStandardG_0002278A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, cure me. Here's 50 caps.
Let me just get my scalpel... shouldn't be long.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethMedicalYe_00022791_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaBethDialogue 10 player.RemoveItem Caps001 50
Yes, cure me. Here's 50 caps.
I'm really sorry. I really wish we had the supplies to spare.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethMedicalYe_00022792_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have 50 caps.
On second thought, never mind.
Your choice. Remember, anytime you need patched up, I can help you.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you heal my radiation?
Sure, I can help you out.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethCureRadia_000227A0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I might be addicted to something.
Dilated pupils. Tremors. Yeah I see it. I can help you for that if you've got the time.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethCureAddic_0002279A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBethCureAddictionYes
There we go... Try to stay off it as relapse is a real possibility.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethCureAddic_0002279E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; set Begin Medical Services variable: setstage aaBethDialogue 20 Player.RemoveItem Caps001 50
Yes, cure me. Here's 50 caps.
Sorry. The Fixer and the smaller doses do cost caps I'm afraid. Come back when you've got the caps. I'd like to help.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethCureAddic_0002279F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have 50 caps.
I think I'll tough it out.
I don't recommend that but its your choice.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do it.
I'll have you rad-free in no time.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethCureRadia_000227A1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaBethDialogue 30 Player.RemoveItem Caps001 50
Here's your 50 caps. Do it.
Well, if you get the caps. I'll be here waiting...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, thanks.
Suit yourself. Don't worry, The Vultures accept ghouls too.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beth [0101F613] (mod) Quest : ([010224A4]aaBethDialogue) 010224A4 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueBeth\aaBethDial_aaBethCureRadia_000227A3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Vultures are taken care of. Everyone at Firewater Cave is dead.
Good job! Well at least we performed some damage control. Although, This operation could have went better. Whatever, no point crying over spilt milk.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonJ_00022D60_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna send some Rangers to sweep the area for any survivors and check the cave for any clues on what they were up to before you arrived.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonJ_00022D60_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the meantime, you deserve to be paid because that wasn't an easy job. Don't worry, I'm true to my word so take this.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonJ_00022D60_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.AddReputation RepNVNcr 1 4

setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 205 if (getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 200 == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 200 1 endif if (getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 120 == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 120 1 endif player.additem Caps001 1000
I didn't find out what they were planning but Hosea and The Vultures are dead.
Fuck! You were supposed to wait until you figured that out! I swear none of you mercs can follow instructions.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonJ_0002304A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, at the very least you cleaned up this mess. No point crying over spilt milk.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonJ_0002304A_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna send some Rangers to sweep the area for any survivors and check the cave for any clues on what they were up to before you arrived.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonJ_0002304A_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the meantime, you deserve to be paid because that wasn't an easy job. Don't worry, I'm true to my word so take this.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonJ_0002304A_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.AddReputation RepNVNcr 1 4

setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 205 if (getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 200 == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 200 1 endif if (getobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 120 == 1) setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 120 1 endif player.additem Caps001 1000
Thank you. It was a pleasure working with you.
Anytime. The Republic always appreciates some help now and then and we're often happy to return the favour.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonJ_00022D62_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speaking of which Jack Hawthorne wants to meet you personally. I think he wants to thank you for all you've done.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonJ_00022D62_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's staying at the Ultra Luxe on The Strip. He wanted to meet you at the Gourmand.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonJ_00022D62_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might be best to go along as soon as you can. Jack doesn't like to be kept waiting.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonJ_00022D62_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 205 1 aaJackHawthorneRef.enable aaJackHawthorneBodyguard01Ref.enable aaJackHawthorneBodyguard02Ref.enable
About time. Ridiculous how much I had to do just to get paid.
You're lucky you're getting paid at all. Regardless, the Republic appreciates the help and likes to reward its agents.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonJ_00022D64_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speaking of which Jack Hawthorne wants to meet you personally. I think he wants to thank you for all you've done.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonJ_00022D64_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's staying at the Ultra Luxe on The Strip. He wanted to meet you at the Gourmand.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonJ_00022D64_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might be best to go along as soon as you can. Jack doesn't like to be kept waiting.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonJ_00022D64_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBNcrQuest 205 1 aaJackHawthorneRef.enable aaJackHawthorneBodyguard01Ref.enable aaJackHawthorneBodyguard02Ref.enable
Why would Jack want to thank me?
Well you killed the man responsible for the death of his daughter. I'm sure he'll want to make sure you're compensated for it.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonW_00023043_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard he pays really well so I wouldn't keep him waiting.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonW_00023043_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What will happen to The Vultures now?
We still don't know what exactly they were planning before you spoiled their plans. So as I said, we'll investigate their camp a little more.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonW_00023045_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I expect we'll have to hunt down a few stragglers in the coming weeks. Might have to warn our caravan drivers of potential attacks.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonW_00023045_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hosea and his group were kind of small time all things considered. Problem was, they had the potential to become a big issue for us down the line.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonW_00023045_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's hard to tell with these kinds of groups. I don't think they'll be as troublesome as the Fiends, put it that way.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonW_00023045_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What will you do now?
Me? Not sure exactly. As I said, I'll be investigating Firewater Cave for any signs of what The Vultures were up to.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonW_00023047_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: After that, I'm not sure. I'm due some time off. Might blow off some steam in New Reno. The booze is cheaper there and I'm a proud cheapskate.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonW_00023047_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. I'll go see Jack when I can.
Very well. It's been a pleasure. Good luck and stay safe out there.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [0101B5A4] (mod) Quest : ([0101583B]aaRTBNcrQuest) The Bear Strikes Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRTBNcrQu_aaRangerWilsonW_00023049_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about Caesar's Legion? If the NCR falls, won't they take over New Vegas?
That's a good question and a very important one to answer for a truly free New Vegas to prosper.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatAbou_00024933_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion taking control of the area might be the only thing worse than a decisive NCR victory.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatAbou_00024933_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's why its important hit the NCR at the correct time. We can't weaken them to the point where they lose the Battle Of Hoover Dam.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatAbou_00024933_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Vultures are tough but I truly do not believe they're ready for the level of brutality that Caesar and his Legate bring.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatAbou_00024933_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ironically, we need the NCR as much as it pains me to hold off the Legion. They're the only ones who have the resources to do so.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatAbou_00024933_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: For all our sakes, I'm praying for a pyrrhic NCR victory. Its our best shot of a truly independent New Vegas.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatAbou_00024933_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a good question and a very important one to answer for a truly free New Vegas to prosper.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatAbou_0002349C_1.wav

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatAbou_0002349C_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think of Mr House?
I don't know much about House but who does really? The only thing I can judge him by are his actions.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatDoYo_00024934_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I look at Vegas currently, I see a city built on heaps and heaps of both old American dollars and bottle caps.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatDoYo_00024934_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: A place of tremendous wealth surrounded on all sides by poverty. While House and the Three Families get richer, children all over starve.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatDoYo_00024934_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: My question would be, where is the wealth going? Is whatever House is building worth all the misery he's conveniently ignoring in New Vegas.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatDoYo_00024934_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That tower alone, could house several thousand people. Instead he uses it to stockpile caps for god knows what.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatDoYo_00024934_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know much about House but who does really? The only thing I can judge him by are his actions.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatDoYo_0002349E_1.wav

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatDoYo_0002349E_3.wav

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatDoYo_0002349E_4.wav

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [01017871] (mod) Quest : ([01017876]aaHoseaFirstEncounterDialogue) 01017876 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaWhatDoYo_0002349E_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard you were a Follower Of The Apocalypse. Why did you leave?
Now, don't get me wrong, I have a lot of respect for the Followers. They truly do care about people which is sadly not too common in the wasteland.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAskAbout_00024939_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I learned a lot over the years. They taught me how to read and write which goes a long way in the world.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAskAbout_00024939_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The amount of knowledge that can be gathered from pre-war books is truly staggering.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAskAbout_00024939_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you've ever had the privilege to visit a pre war library then you'll know what I'm talking about.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAskAbout_00024939_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Without them I wouldn't be anywhere near as good a physician as I am today. I also met a lot of great people like Jackie over the years.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAskAbout_00024939_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sadly, a few years back, I just felt like it was time to leave because it just wasn't for me anymore.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAskAbout_00024939_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I looked around at all the good we'd done but I also realised that things were just going to get worse because the NCR didn't want to change.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAskAbout_00024939_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I kept thinking: "what's the point of believing in the potential for a better world if you're not willing to fight for it?"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hosea [0102190E] (mod) Quest : ([0102408D]aaHoseaFirewaterCaveDialogue) 0102408D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueHosea\aaHoseaFir_aaHoseaAskAbout_00024939_8.wav
