ESP.ORIGINAL: If you really want to prove your loyalty you can join us. We're about to breach in the next few minutes.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonS_000367A5_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're either with or against us. No ifs and buts. So what'll it be?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonS_000367A5_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: RewardXP 35
I didn't want to arouse suspicion by leaving when the task was on site.
I don't know what it is but there's something shifty about you. This is why I don't like working with mercs.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonS_000367A6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can never know how low they'll stoop for some extra caps. No, I definitely don't trust you.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonS_000367A6_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you're trying to lead us into a trap. Everyone, let's put this motherfucker down.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonS_000367A6_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetEnemy PlayerFaction aaRTBNcrFaction 0 0 SetEnemy aaTheVultures aaRTBNcrFaction 0 0 aaVultureNcrFight01Ref.enable aaVultureNcrFight02Ref.enable setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 255 setstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 145 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 140 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 145 1 aaRangerWilsonCampGolfRef.disable
Hosea doesn't like me much. He'd notice if I left.
<Attack> You're right. I'm not loyal. Time to die Wilson!
Everyone, open fire! Open fire!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wilson [01033C3A] (mod) Quest : ([01033F2F]aaRangerWilsonConfrontationDialogue) 01033F2F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueRangerWilson\aaRangerWi_aaRangerWilsonS_000367A8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetEnemy PlayerFaction aaRTBNcrFaction 0 0 SetEnemy aaTheVultures aaRTBNcrFaction 0 0 aaVultureNcrFight01Ref.enable aaVultureNcrFight02Ref.enable setstage aaRTBNcrQuest 255 setstage aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 145 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 140 1 setobjectivedisplayed aaRTBTheVulturesQuest 145 1
Who are you again?
Not from the NCR then? Can tell because there's not a man alive there who doesn't know to respect or fear me.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00037BCD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You worked with my daughter before those animals killed her. They're lucky you got to them before I got my hands on them.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00037BCD_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would have shown them the real meaning of pain. Hurt them in ways that they wouldn't even believe was possible.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00037BCD_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: By the end, I would have had them wishing for death. That is who I am.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00037BCD_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who is Coleridge?
You wouldn't know him. He's one of those spineless bureaucrats in the senate who couldn't organise an orgy in a fucking brothel.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00037BCF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: When my caravans were first attacked by those raider fucks, I politely asked Coleridge to solve the problem.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00037BCF_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: When his incompetence got my daughter butchered, I told him the truth of the situation.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00037BCF_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mentioned that my donations to his reelection campaign might somehow find their way in the pot of his opponent.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00037BCF_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: And thus, the caps were found for a contractor.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00037BCF_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you know Heck Gunderson is here?
Yeah, I saw him in the foyer and he offered me his condolences. Odd, for him to show such compassion. We're rivals after all.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00037BD1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been led to believe that his son went missing in this very restaurant. Perhaps he's looking for a gun for hire.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00037BD1_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Despite our differences in the past, I wouldn't wish the death of a man's child on anyone. I hope young Ted is alright.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00037BD1_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What will happen to the Freeside Co-op now?
It'll be shut down for now while we make the funeral arrangements for Ella. We'll bring her back to the Republic.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00037EB0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Her mother deserves to see her daughter one last time. I don't want my little girl to remain in this hellhole one minute longer.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00037EB0_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for Vegas, I have a right mind to up my share of the take. Make these bastards pay for the funeral.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00037EB0_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You offer your hand to help and they'd rather side with Raiders. Coleridge said the locals were unwilling to help in finding Hosea.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00037EB0_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe I'll be unwilling to help them in return.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00037EB0_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you and your henchmen get weapons past the guards?
I made a deal with these White Glove freaks. I own one of the biggest cattle ranches back west. So does Gunderson.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00037EB2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I reminded them that centralising your source of meat when your main delicacy is Brahmin Wellington would not be the brightest idea.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00037EB2_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who knows, we may be able to make a deal in the future if the terms are right.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00037EB2_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should get going.
Very well. Thanks again.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00037EB4_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRangerWilsonFirewaterCaveRef.disable aaRangerWilsonFirewaterCaveRef.MarkForDelete aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier01Ref.disable aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier01Ref.MarkForDelete aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier02Ref.disable aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier02Ref.MarkForDelete aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier03Ref.disable aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier03Ref.MarkForDelete aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier04Ref.disable aaFirewaterCaveNcrSoldier04Ref.MarkForDelete
Who was your daughter again?
Ah Hosea's victims must've been many. I hear you worked with her in one of my stores: The Freeside Coop.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00038472_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I also hear you're responsible for bringing her killers to justice.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00038472_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: And what's my reward?
Don't worry I pay well enough. I'm sure Coleridge's lackey paid you a decent sum of caps too.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00038474_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here. An extra five hundred caps on top of your already generous sum. This was originally meant to buy furnishings for the co-op.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00038474_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was supposed to go towards getting a fancy sign from that snooty prick Angelo just down the road.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00038474_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You deserve it more than that charlatan. Now, I'd like to be left alone to gather my thoughts if you don't mind.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00038474_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you have any last questions, please make them quick.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00038474_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem Caps001 500 setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 251 1 CompleteQuest aaRTBNcrQuest showmessage aaRTBModCompleteMsg
No need. I didn't do it for a reward.
I don't know whether your reasons for turning down payment are altruistic or because of contempt for me.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00038476_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: These days, its hard to tell. Regardless, it's your choice and I won't force the matter.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00038476_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, I'd like to be left alone to gather my thoughts if you don't mind. If you have any last questions, please make them quick.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack Hawthorne [01023499] (mod) Quest : ([01037604]aaJackHawthorneDialogue) 01037604 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueJackHawthorne\aaJackHawt_aaJackHawthorne_00038476_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaRTBNcrQuest 251 1 CompleteQuest aaRTBNcrQuest showmessage aaRTBModCompleteMsg
Yeah, I'm new in town. Never been here before.
Ah, I'm not far behind you. Only came here a few weeks back. It's been hard to settle in, especially when your nickname is NCR bitch.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry about that though, just dumb idiots being dumb idiots I guess. They'll accept this place in time.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_0003875D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'd like to think so anyway. Now, is there anything I can get you?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_0003875D_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. I've been in Freeside a bunch of times.
You'll know this place better than me then. I moved in here only a few weeks back and it's been hard to settle in.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_0003875F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't help when you're colloquially known as the NCR bitch. Don't worry about that though, that's just dumb idiots being dumb idiots.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_0003875F_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They'll accept this place in time. Well I'd like to think so anyway. Now, is there anything I can get you?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_0003875F_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mentioned before that people called you an NCR bitch? Why?
Well it's no secret I'm from the republic. My dad and I deal with a lot of the local farmers so the name Hawthorne is well known around these parts.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00038761_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't help when the Kings are riling people up blaming us NCR folk for Freeside's problems.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00038761_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you like living in Freeside?
God, no! When I first thought about moving out to the frontier. I was expecting excitement, adventure!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00038763_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Instead, it mostly just smells of piss and disappointment. Although that may just be the locals.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00038763_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got a word of advice for ya stranger, watch your caps out there especially near Mick and Ralph's.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00038763_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pickpockets everywhere. Nobody would stand for that back home in the republic. NCR police would sort them out quick.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00038763_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wouldn't be able to look myself in the mirror if that were me.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00038763_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you thought about hiring more security? That sounds dangerous.
I don't have the spare caps I'm afraid. Only got enough to hire an extra mercenary and guess who that is.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00038A42_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess I could go ask Pa for help but I know what he's like. He worries too much. I can handle this myself.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00038A42_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, yeah. You'll have to deal with this little problem for me.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ella Hawthorne [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01000EAB]aaFreesideCoopEllaHawthorneDialogue) 01000EAB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniqueEllaHawthorne\aaFreeside_aaEllaHawthorne_00038A42_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah fuck this. Yeah, I should probably just kill you.
Looks like we've got an intruder and a bad liar. Everyone, let's kill this moron!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookS_0003A6E6_1.wav

aaClarenceCookBarterCheck1
Travelling merchant huh? You picked a bit of an odd place to set up shop. A steel mill wouldn't be my first pick to lay my head at night.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookB_0003A6E8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not selling goods to Fiends now are ya?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookB_0003A6E8_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: RewardXP 45
I'm just a peddlar of fine goods, friend. This fine abode looked as comfy a place as any to settle.
Now why would a travelling merchant decide to settle on this side of the bridge only to get robbed by Fiends?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookB_0003A6EF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you're bullshitting me. Vultures, let's teach this liar a lesson shall we?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookB_0003A6EF_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue.hasClarenceAttackedPlayer to 1 startcombat player aaClarenceGuardSteelMill1Ref.startcombat player aaClarenceGuardSteelMill2Ref.startcombat player
I, uh, sell stuff to people. This looked like a good location I guess.
I don't sell to those scum. I'm taking a shortcut to New Vegas. I-15 isn't as bad as people say.
Admirable. It's not often you meet an idealist out here. And you're brave, those cazadors send shivers up my spine.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookB_0003A6EA_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. You're welcome to leave here alive. Just try not to come back as this is our turf and we won't be as polite the second time.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookB_0003A6EA_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boys! Let them through. It's just a travelling merchant that's taken a wrong turn. They'll be leaving shortly!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookB_0003A6EA_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: A merchant's gotta make their living somehow don't they?
Off the misery of others? You're exactly the type of spineless little shit that Hosea was talking about.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookB_0003A6EC_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boys, let's teach this fucker a lesson!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookB_0003A6EC_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue.hasClarenceAttackedPlayer to 1 startcombat player aaClarenceGuardSteelMill1Ref.startcombat player aaClarenceGuardSteelMill2Ref.startcombat player
Damn right! Screw the NCR! I'm selling chems to the Fiends, the Khans will have their revenge.
You don't happen to be one of the Khans do you? We're really sorry for what the NCR did to your tribe.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookB_0003A6EE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wouldn't wish Bitter Springs on anyone. It's a big part of why Hosea hates those NCR bastards!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookB_0003A6EE_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're welcome to leave but know that this is Vulture territory and this generosity won't be given a second time.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookB_0003A6EE_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boys! Let them through. We don't want to fuck with no Khans!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookB_0003A6EE_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: A steel mill has all kinds of unique parts. A wise prospector could make a lot of caps.
And you're the wise prospector? I wouldn't be so sure about that, sticking your head into Fiend territory.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookS_0003A6F1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha! Should have saw your face. I'm only fucking with you, we're not Fiends. You're lucky that we're not a gang of those juiced up psychos.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookS_0003A6F1_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, this is our territory. You're welcome to leave but don't show your face around here again. We won't be so nice next time.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookS_0003A6F1_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boys! Let them through! This one's taken a wrong turn and I'm just showing them on their way.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookS_0003A6F1_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: High risk areas tend to come with the highest rewards. No competition.
I don't think you've thought this one through have you? Fiends are raiders. They take everything they can get their hands on.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookS_0003A6F3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This entire area has probably already been picked clean. You're not very good at the whole prospecting thing are you?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookS_0003A6F3_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, this is our territory. You're welcome to leave but don't show your face around here again. We won't be so nice next time.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookS_0003A6F3_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boys! This one isn't very bright. Let them through, they've just wandered in here not knowing any better!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookS_0003A6F3_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's it to you? This claim is mine!
You don't realise that you're outnumbered do you? I think its about time we teach you a lesson in manners.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookS_0003A6F5_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boys! We've got ourselves an annoying fly to swat. Let's kill this bastard!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clarence Cook [0100770F] (mod) Quest : ([010079F1]aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue) 010079F1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueClarenceCook\aaFreeside_aaClarenceCookS_0003A6F5_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaFreesideCoopClarenceDialogue.hasClarenceAttackedPlayer to 1 startcombat player aaClarenceGuardSteelMill1Ref.startcombat player aaClarenceGuardSteelMill2Ref.startcombat player
I investigated this area earlier trying to find you. What actually happened?
You did? That must be why Hosea was so quick finding you. He must have realised you were hot on his heels.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0003A9D4_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll never forget that night. I knew someone had been watching me all day ever since leaving Ella's place.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0003A9D4_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was later, when I went out scavenging near those houses near the old steel mill when I noticed the same people who were watching in Freeside.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0003A9D4_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's when I knew they were definitely following me so later that night I slept with my pistol close by the pillow.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0003A9D4_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: When they came that's when I had to pull the trigger for the first time. I had to watch that lady die...it's not a nice thing to see that.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0003A9D4_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I still see the look in her eyes when I sleep. It haunts me. I don't know how raiders do it. For money? Survival?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0003A9D4_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the last thing I remember seeing before I got knocked out and dragged to the steel mill. Hope that answers your question.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0003A9D4_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you go from killing a Vulture to joining them a day or two later?
I'm as shocked as you are honestly. When they captured me, I thought I was a goner for sure.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0003A9D6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not very often you kill a gang member in Vegas in front of their friends and live to tell the tale.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0003A9D6_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought they were going to kick me in the furnace the entire time I was tied up in that godforsaken mill.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0003A9D6_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: After a few hours though, Hosea told them to loosen my restraints and come sit downstairs with him.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0003A9D6_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't have much choice in the matter so I went and listened to what he had to say. I don't quite know how to put it stranger...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0003A9D6_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But everything Hosea said just sort of made sense. There's no real reason why the people of Freeside should be treated like dirt.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0003A9D6_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're no different from those big wigs on The Strip, we're all flesh and blood at the end of the day.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0003A9D6_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He said NCR are only here for the water in some big old lake. That sounds like them. I know what they're like.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0003A9D6_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: One time, some NCR grunt stole me and Billy's claim near Nelson. We got there fair and square but he pointed his gun at us and threatened us.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0003A9D6_9.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, back to the mill, that's when Hosea offered me a choice; one to really change things around here. To hell with being a killer just for caps.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0003A9D6_10.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have it in me. If I need to kill, it has to be for something. I told Hosea that and from there he let me join.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0003A9D6_11.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's rough going but I think this might be the life for me you know.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0003A9D6_12.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's nice to meet you Frank. Nah, Hosea said you'll brief me.
Ah likewise. I heard you were a mercenary too so we've got a lot in common. He said I'll brief you?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0003A9D8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He must be testing my memory. Well he won't be disappointed thankfully as your man here has a good memory.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0003A9D8_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR transport crops using caravans from the local farms from here to the Mojave Outpost and then further onto NCR territory.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0003A9D8_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That corn could feed all of Vegas. So what he needs us to do is obtain the caravan schedule.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0003A9D8_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No fucking clue what the plan is. Hurry up and tell me you annoying little shit.
Okay... okay. Settle down will you? Honestly, got no idea why people get so easily annoyed. Now, if you're done being an ass I'll tell you.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0003A9DA_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR transport crops using caravans from the local farms from here to the Mojave Outpost and then further onto NCR territory.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0003A9DA_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That corn could feed all of Vegas. So what he needs us to do is obtain the caravan schedule.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank Adams [0101FBDB] (mod) Quest : ([0101FBDD]aaRTBFrankAdamsMotelDialogue) 0101FBDD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaMaleUniqueFrankAdams\aaRTBFrank_aaFrankAdamsMot_0003A9DA_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi, nice to meet you. I just obtained an NCR caravan schedule with Frank.
So you're one of the new recruits Hosea was talking about? Sorry, gotta be careful these days, Fiends are getting bold too.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaFriendly_0003AF96_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough about that though, I'm Paula and I'm the one unlucky enough to have the responsibility of watching the front door.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaFriendly_0003AF96_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This here is Firewater Cave. This little shithole cave is one of the only places outside of NCR jurisdiction.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaFriendly_0003AF96_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try not to steal anyone's bed, I swear if I need to deal with bed bugs again because some lazy prick can't seal their kit properly.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaFriendly_0003AF96_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry about that. I'll be sure to check I'm not stealing a mattress first.
Finally someone in this place whose actually considerate. Well I'll be. I'm used to everyone just taking what scraps they can get around here.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaBedBugsN_0003AF98_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now before you go, I'll give you a quick rundown of this place. If you need patching up, I recommend you go speak to Beth.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaBedBugsN_0003AF98_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: She can be found right at the bottom of this cave just before the hermetic door into that godforsaken bunker.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaBedBugsN_0003AF98_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're needing weapons, ammo or just general repairs then Dexter is the man you're looking for.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaBedBugsN_0003AF98_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That guy is mighty good with a screwdriver and a wrench, let me tell you. Wouldn't mind having his skills.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaBedBugsN_0003AF98_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, with that out the way, is there anything else I can do for you or you good?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaBedBugsN_0003AF98_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't shoot. I'm not a threat. I'm one of the new guys.
So you're one of the new recruits Hosea was talking about? Sorry, gotta be careful these days, Fiends are getting bold too.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaFriendly_0003AF9A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough about that though, I'm Paula and I'm the one unlucky enough to have the responsibility of watching the front door.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaFriendly_0003AF9A_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This here is Firewater Cave. This little shithole cave is one of the only places outside of NCR jurisdiction.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaFriendly_0003AF9A_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try not to steal anyone's bed, I swear if I need to deal with bed bugs again because some lazy prick can't seal their kit properly.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaFriendly_0003AF9A_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're going to shoot you better not miss. I don't care about friendly fire.
Friendly fire? What the fuck are you talking about? Wait. You must be one of the new recruits Hosea mentioned.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaFriendly_0003AF9C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, if you're done with your weak ass threats, I'm Paula and I'm the one unlucky enough to have the responsibility of watching the front door.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaFriendly_0003AF9C_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seems like you know your shit then. The people around here will take any bed they can get. So that liner you mentioned might come in handy.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaBedBugsS_0003AF9E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway before you go, I'll give you a quick rundown of this place. If you need patching up, I recommend you go speak to Beth.

ESP.ORIGINAL: She can be found right at the bottom of this cave just before the hermetic door into that godforsaken bunker.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaBedBugsS_0003AF9E_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: RewardXP 40
I carry a sleeping bag liner with me at all times. It's really good for dealing with any pests.
If you say so. Just try and show some basic hygiene, that's all I ask. That seems like a lot to ask from a lot of the people here though.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just chuck my sleeping bag in a puddle every morning. Gets rid of germs.
Don't worry. I bathe every now and then. Any matress I steal will at least be clean afterwards.
You're joking but the smell down there can be downright horrible sometimes. Best of luck.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paula [0101F600] (mod) Quest : ([01021ECB]aaPaulaFriendlyDialogue) 01021ECB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\RaceToTheBottom.esm\aaFemaleUniquePaula\aaPaulaFri_aaPaulaBedBugsC_0003AFA1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll sleep wherever I damn well please.
We'll see about that. I swear if I start itching then you'll be getting a broken jaw.
